   20: -module(gen_sctp_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: -include_lib("kernel/include/inet_sctp.hrl").
   24: -include("kernel_test_lib.hrl").
   25: 
   26: %%-compile(export_all).
   27: 
   28: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0,
   29: 	 init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   30: 	 init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   31: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   32: -export([
   33:          skip_old_solaris/1,
   34:          basic/1,
   35: 
   36:          api_open_close/1,
   37:          api_listen/1,
   38:          api_connect_init/1,
   39:          api_connectx_init/1,
   40:          api_opts/1,
   41: 
   42:          xfer_min/1,xfer_active/1,def_sndrcvinfo/1,implicit_inet6/1,
   43:          open_multihoming_ipv4_socket/1,
   44:          open_unihoming_ipv6_socket/1,
   45:          open_multihoming_ipv6_socket/1,
   46:          open_multihoming_ipv4_and_ipv6_socket/1,
   47:          basic_stream/1, xfer_stream_min/1, active_n/1,
   48:          peeloff_active_once/1, peeloff_active_true/1, peeloff_active_n/1,
   49:          buffers/1, send_block/1,
   50:          names_unihoming_ipv4/1, names_unihoming_ipv6/1,
   51:          names_multihoming_ipv4/1, names_multihoming_ipv6/1,
   52:          recv_close/1,
   53: 
   54:          t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv/1,
   55:          t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv/1,
   56:          t_simple_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv/1,
   57:          t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv/1,
   58:          t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_connectx_init/1,
   59: 
   60:          non_block_send/1
   61:         ]).
   62: 
   63: suite() ->
   64:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   65:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   66: 
   67: all() ->
   68:     G = case is_old_solaris() of
   69: 	    true -> old_solaris;
   70: 	    false -> extensive
   71: 	end,
   72:     [
   73:      {group, smoke},
   74:      {group, G},
   75:      {group, sockaddr},
   76:      {group, misc}
   77:     ].
   78: 
   79: groups() -> 
   80:     [
   81:      {smoke,       [], smoke_cases()},
   82:      {old_solaris, [], old_solaris_cases()},
   83:      {extensive,   [], extensive_cases()},
   84: 
   85:      {sockaddr,    [], sockaddr_cases()},
   86: 
   87:      {misc,        [], misc_cases()}
   88:     ].
   89: 
   90: smoke_cases() ->
   91:     [
   92:      basic,
   93:      basic_stream
   94:     ].
   95: 
   96: old_solaris_cases() ->
   97:     [
   98:      skip_old_solaris
   99:     ].
  100: 
  101: extensive_cases() ->
  102:     [
  103:      api_open_close, api_listen, api_connect_init, api_connectx_init,
  104:      api_opts, xfer_min, xfer_active, def_sndrcvinfo, implicit_inet6,
  105:      open_multihoming_ipv4_socket,
  106:      open_unihoming_ipv6_socket,
  107:      open_multihoming_ipv6_socket,
  108:      open_multihoming_ipv4_and_ipv6_socket, active_n,
  109:      xfer_stream_min, peeloff_active_once,
  110:      peeloff_active_true, peeloff_active_n, buffers, send_block,
  111:      names_unihoming_ipv4, names_unihoming_ipv6,
  112:      names_multihoming_ipv4, names_multihoming_ipv6,
  113:      recv_close
  114:     ].
  115: 
  116: sockaddr_cases() ->
  117:     [
  118:      t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv,
  119:      t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv,
  120:      t_simple_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv,
  121:      t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv,
  122:      t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_connectx_init
  123:     ].
  124: 
  125: misc_cases() ->
  126:     [
  127:      non_block_send
  128:     ].
  129: 
  130: 
  131: 
  132: %% This (Config) was ignored before, why?
  133: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  134: 
  135:     ?P("init_per_suite -> entry with"
  136:        "~n      Config: ~p"
  137:        "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  138: 
  139:     case gen_sctp:open() of
  140: 	{ok, Socket} ->
  141: 	    gen_sctp:close(Socket),
  142: 
  143:             case ?LIB:init_per_suite(Config0) of
  144:                 {skip, _} = SKIP ->
  145:                     SKIP;
  146: 
  147:                 Config1 when is_list(Config1) ->
  148: 
  149:                     ?P("init_per_suite -> end when "
  150:                        "~n      Config: ~p", [Config1]),
  151: 
  152:                     %% We need a monitor on this node also
  153:                     kernel_test_sys_monitor:start(),
  154: 
  155:                     Config1
  156:             end;
  157: 
  158: 	{error, Error}
  159: 	  when Error =:= eprotonosupport;
  160: 	       Error =:= esocktnosupport ->
  161: 	    {skip,"SCTP not supported on this machine"}
  162:     end.
  163: 
  164: end_per_suite(Config0) ->
  165: 
  166:     ?P("end_per_suite -> entry with"
  167:        "~n      Config: ~p"
  168:        "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  169: 
  170:     %% Stop the local monitor
  171:     kernel_test_sys_monitor:stop(),
  172: 
  173:     Config1 = ?LIB:end_per_suite(Config0),
  174: 
  175:     ?P("end_per_suite -> "
  176:        "~n      Nodes: ~p", [erlang:nodes()]),
  177: 
  178:     Config1.
  179: 
  180: init_per_group(sockaddr = _GroupName, Config) ->
  181:     ?P("init_per_group(sockaddr) -> do we support 'socket'"),
  182:     try socket:info() of
  183: 	_ ->
  184:             ?P("init_per_group(sockaddr) -> we support 'socket'"),
  185:             Config
  186:     catch
  187:         error : notsup ->
  188:             ?P("init_per_group(sockaddr) -> we *do not* support 'socket'"),
  189:             {skip, "esock not supported"};
  190:         error : undef ->
  191:             ?P("init_per_group(sockaddr) -> 'socket' not configured"),
  192:             {skip, "esock not configured"}
  193:     end;
  194: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  195:     Config.
  196: 
  197: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  198:     Config.
  199: 
  200: 
  201: init_per_testcase(api_connectx_init=Case, Config) ->
  202:     check_sctp_connectx(Case, Config);
  203: init_per_testcase(t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_connectx_init=Case, Config) ->
  204:     check_sctp_connectx(Case, Config);
  205: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  206:     init_per_testcase_common(Case, Config).
  207:     
  208: init_per_testcase_common(_Case, Config) ->
  209: 
  210:     ?P("init_per_testcase -> entry with"
  211:        "~n   Config:   ~p"
  212:        "~n   Nodes:    ~p"
  213:        "~n   Links:    ~p"
  214:        "~n   Monitors: ~p",
  215:        [Config, erlang:nodes(), pi(links), pi(monitors)]),
  216: 
  217:     kernel_test_global_sys_monitor:reset_events(),
  218: 
  219:     ?P("init_per_testcase -> done when"
  220:        "~n   Nodes:    ~p"
  221:        "~n   Links:    ~p"
  222:        "~n   Monitors: ~p", [erlang:nodes(), pi(links), pi(monitors)]),
  223: 
  224:     Config.
  225: 
  226: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  227:     ?P("end_per_testcase -> entry with"
  228:        "~n   Config:   ~p"
  229:        "~n   Nodes:    ~p"
  230:        "~n   Links:    ~p"
  231:        "~n   Monitors: ~p",
  232:        [Config, erlang:nodes(), pi(links), pi(monitors)]),
  233: 
  234:     ?P("system events during test: "
  235:        "~n   ~p", [kernel_test_global_sys_monitor:events()]),
  236: 
  237:     ?P("end_per_testcase -> done with"
  238:        "~n   Nodes:    ~p"
  239:        "~n   Links:    ~p"
  240:        "~n   Monitors: ~p", [erlang:nodes(), pi(links), pi(monitors)]),
  241:     ok.
  242: 
  243: 
  244: -define(LOGVAR(Var), begin io:format(??Var" = ~p~n", [Var]), Var end).
  245: -define(no_return(Expr), error({unexpected, Expr})).
  246: 
  247: check_sctp_connectx(Case, Config) ->
  248:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open([]),
  249:     try
  250:         {ok,Pb} = inet:port(S),
  251:         case gen_sctp:connectx_init(S, [{127,0,0,1}], Pb, []) of
  252:             {error, enotsup} ->
  253:                 {skip, "sctp_connectx unsupported"};
  254:             _ ->
  255:                 init_per_testcase_common(Case, Config)
  256:         end
  257:     after
  258:         gen_sctp:close(S)
  259:     end.
  260: 
  261: is_old_solaris() ->
  262:     os:type() =:= {unix,sunos} andalso os:version() < {5,12,0}.
  263: 
  264: skip_old_solaris(_Config) ->
  265:     {skip,"Unreliable test cases and/or implementation on old Solaris"}.
  266: 
  267: %% Hello world.
  268: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  269:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open(),
  270:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S),
  271:     ok.
  272: 
  273: %% Minimal data transfer.
  274: xfer_min(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  275:     Stream = 0,
  276:     Data = <<"The quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog 0123456789">>,
  277:     Loopback = {127,0,0,1},
  278:     StatOpts =
  279: 	[recv_avg,recv_cnt,recv_max,recv_oct,
  280: 	 send_avg,send_cnt,send_max,send_oct],
  281:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open([{type,seqpacket}]),
  282:     {ok,SbStat1} = inet:getstat(Sb, StatOpts),
  283:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(Sb),
  284:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
  285: 
  286:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open(),
  287:     {ok,Pa} = inet:port(Sa),
  288:     {ok,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
  289: 			   error=0,
  290: 			   outbound_streams=SaOutboundStreams,
  291: 			   inbound_streams=SaInboundStreams,
  292: 			   assoc_id=SaAssocId}=SaAssocChange} =
  293: 	gen_sctp:connect(Sa, Loopback, Pb, []),
  294:     {SbAssocId,SaOutboundStreams,SaInboundStreams} =
  295: 	case recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))) of
  296: 	    {Loopback,Pa,
  297: 	     #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
  298: 				error=0,
  299: 				outbound_streams=SbOutboundStreams,
  300: 				inbound_streams=SbInboundStreams,
  301: 				assoc_id=AssocId}} ->
  302: 		{AssocId,SbInboundStreams,SbOutboundStreams};
  303: 	    {Loopback,Pa,
  304: 	     #sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_confirmed,
  305: 				addr={Loopback,Pa},
  306: 				error=0,
  307: 				assoc_id=AssocId}} ->
  308: 		{Loopback,Pa,
  309: 		 #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
  310: 				    error=0,
  311: 				    outbound_streams=SbOutboundStreams,
  312: 				    inbound_streams=SbInboundStreams,
  313: 				    assoc_id=AssocId}} =
  314: 		    recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))),
  315: 		{AssocId,SbInboundStreams,SbOutboundStreams}
  316: 	end,
  317: 
  318:     ok = gen_sctp:send(Sa, SaAssocId, 0, Data),
  319:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity)) of
  320: 	{Loopback,
  321: 	 Pa,
  322: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream   = Stream,
  323: 			   assoc_id = SbAssocId}],
  324: 	 Data} -> ok;
  325: 	Event1 ->
  326: 	    case recv_event(Event1) of
  327: 		{Loopback,Pa,
  328: 		 #sctp_paddr_change{addr = {Loopback,_},
  329: 				    state = State,
  330: 				    error = 0,
  331: 				    assoc_id = SbAssocId}}
  332: 		  when State =:= addr_available;
  333: 		       State =:= addr_confirmed ->
  334: 		    {Loopback,
  335: 		     Pa,
  336: 		     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
  337: 				       assoc_id=SbAssocId}],
  338: 		     Data} = log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))
  339: 	    end
  340:     end,
  341:     ok = gen_sctp:send(Sb, SbAssocId, 0, Data),
  342:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity)) of
  343: 	{Loopback,Pb,
  344: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
  345: 			   assoc_id=SaAssocId}],
  346: 	 Data} ->
  347: 	    ok;
  348: 	Event2 ->
  349: 	    {Loopback,Pb,
  350: 	     #sctp_paddr_change{addr={_,Pb},
  351: 				state=addr_confirmed,
  352: 				error=0,
  353: 				assoc_id=SaAssocId}} =
  354: 		recv_event(Event2),
  355: 	    {Loopback,
  356: 	     Pb,
  357: 	     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
  358: 			       assoc_id=SaAssocId}],
  359: 	     Data} =
  360: 		log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))
  361:     end,
  362:     %%
  363:     ok = gen_sctp:eof(Sa, SaAssocChange),
  364:     {Loopback,Pa,#sctp_shutdown_event{assoc_id=SbAssocId}} =
  365: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))),
  366:     {Loopback,Pb,
  367:      #sctp_assoc_change{state=shutdown_comp,
  368: 			error=0,
  369: 			assoc_id=SaAssocId}} =
  370: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))),
  371:     {Loopback,Pa,
  372:      #sctp_assoc_change{state=shutdown_comp,
  373: 			error=0,
  374: 			assoc_id=SbAssocId}} =
  375: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))),
  376:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
  377:     {ok,SbStat2} = inet:getstat(Sb, StatOpts),
  378:     [] = filter_stat_eq(SbStat1, SbStat2),
  379:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb),
  380: 
  381:     receive
  382: 	Msg -> ct:fail({received,Msg})
  383:     after 17 -> ok
  384:     end,
  385:     ok.
  386: 
  387: filter_stat_eq([], []) ->
  388:     [];
  389: filter_stat_eq([{Tag,Val1}=Stat|SbStat1], [{Tag,Val2}|SbStat2]) ->
  390:     if
  391: 	Val1 == Val2 ->
  392: 	    [Stat|filter_stat_eq(SbStat1, SbStat2)];
  393: 	true ->
  394: 	    filter_stat_eq(SbStat1, SbStat2)
  395:     end.
  396: 
  397: 
  398: 
  399: %% Minimal data transfer in active mode.
  400: xfer_active(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  401:     Timeout = 2000,
  402:     Stream = 0,
  403:     Data = <<"The quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog 0123456789">>,
  404:     Loopback = {127,0,0,1},
  405:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open([{active,true}]),
  406:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(Sb),
  407:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
  408: 
  409:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open([{active,true}]),
  410:     {ok,Pa} = inet:port(Sa),
  411:     ok = gen_sctp:connect_init(Sa, Loopback, Pb, []),
  412:     #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
  413: 		       error=0,
  414: 		       outbound_streams=SaOutboundStreams,
  415: 		       inbound_streams=SaInboundStreams,
  416: 		       assoc_id=SaAssocId} = SaAssocChange =
  417: 	recv_assoc_change(Sa, Loopback, Pb, Timeout),
  418:     io:format("Sa=~p, Pa=~p, Sb=~p, Pb=~p, SaAssocId=~p, "
  419: 	      "SaOutboundStreams=~p, SaInboundStreams=~p~n",
  420: 	      [Sa,Pa,Sb,Pb,SaAssocId,
  421: 	       SaOutboundStreams,SaInboundStreams]),
  422:     #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
  423: 		       error=0,
  424: 		       outbound_streams=SbOutboundStreams,
  425: 		       inbound_streams=SbInboundStreams,
  426: 		       assoc_id=SbAssocId} =
  427: 	recv_assoc_change(Sb, Loopback, Pa, Timeout),
  428:     SbOutboundStreams = SaInboundStreams,
  429:     SbInboundStreams = SaOutboundStreams,
  430:     io:format("SbAssocId=~p~n", [SbAssocId]),
  431: 
  432:     case recv_paddr_change(Sa, Loopback, Pb, 314) of
  433: 	#sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_confirmed,
  434: 			   addr={_,Pb},
  435: 			   error=0,
  436: 			   assoc_id=SaAssocId} -> ok;
  437: 	#sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_available,
  438: 			   addr={_,Pb},
  439: 			   error=0,
  440: 			   assoc_id=SaAssocId} -> ok;
  441: 	timeout -> ok
  442:     end,
  443:     case recv_paddr_change(Sb, Loopback, Pa, 314) of
  444: 	#sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_confirmed,
  445: 			   addr={Loopback,Pa},
  446: 			   error=0,
  447: 			   assoc_id=SbAssocId} -> ok;
  448: 	#sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_available,
  449: 			   addr={Loopback,P},
  450: 			   error=0,
  451: 			   assoc_id=SbAssocId} ->
  452: 	    match_unless_solaris(Pa, P);
  453: 	timeout -> ok
  454:     end,
  455:     [] = flush(),
  456: 
  457:     ok =
  458: 	do_from_other_process(
  459: 	  fun () -> gen_sctp:send(Sa, SaAssocId, 0, Data) end),
  460:     receive
  461: 	{sctp,Sb,Loopback,Pa,
  462: 	 {[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
  463: 			    assoc_id=SbAssocId}],
  464: 	  Data}} -> ok
  465:     after Timeout ->
  466: 	    ct:fail({timeout,flush()})
  467:     end,
  468:     ok = gen_sctp:send(Sb, SbAssocId, 0, Data),
  469:     receive
  470: 	{sctp,Sa,Loopback,Pb,
  471: 	 {[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
  472: 			    assoc_id=SaAssocId}],
  473: 	  Data}} -> ok
  474:     after Timeout ->
  475: 	    ct:fail({timeout,flush()})
  476:     end,
  477:     %%
  478:     ok = gen_sctp:abort(Sa, SaAssocChange),
  479:     case recv_assoc_change(Sb, Loopback, Pa, Timeout) of
  480: 	#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_lost,
  481: 			   assoc_id=SbAssocId} -> ok;
  482: 	timeout ->
  483: 	    ct:fail({timeout,flush()})
  484:     end,
  485:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb),
  486:     case recv_assoc_change(Sa, Loopback, Pb, Timeout) of
  487: 	#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_lost,
  488: 			   assoc_id=SaAssocId} -> ok;
  489: 	timeout ->
  490: 	    io:format("timeout waiting for comm_lost on Sa~n"),
  491: 	    match_unless_solaris(ok, {timeout,flush()})
  492:     end,
  493:     receive
  494: 	{sctp_error,Sa,enotconn} -> ok % Solaris
  495:     after 17 -> ok
  496:     end,
  497:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
  498:     %%
  499:     receive
  500: 	Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected,[Msg]++flush()})
  501:     after 17 -> ok
  502:     end,
  503:     ok.
  504: 
  505: recv_assoc_change(S, Addr, Port, Timeout) ->
  506:     receive
  507: 	{sctp,S,Addr,Port,{[], #sctp_assoc_change{}=AssocChange}} ->
  508: 	    AssocChange;
  509: 	{sctp,S,Addr,Port,
  510: 	 {[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=AssocId}],
  511: 	  #sctp_assoc_change{assoc_id=AssocId}=AssocChange}} ->
  512: 	    AssocChange
  513:     after Timeout ->
  514: 	    timeout
  515:     end.
  516: 
  517: recv_paddr_change(S, Addr, Port, Timeout) ->
  518:     receive
  519: 	{sctp,S,Addr,Port,{[], #sctp_paddr_change{}=PaddrChange}} ->
  520: 	    PaddrChange;
  521: 	{sctp,S,Addr,Port,
  522: 	 {[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=AssocId}],
  523: 	  #sctp_paddr_change{assoc_id=AssocId}=PaddrChange}} ->
  524: 	    PaddrChange
  525:     after Timeout ->
  526: 	    timeout
  527:     end.
  528: 
  529: %% Test that #sctp_sndrcvinfo{} parameters set on a socket
  530: %% are used by gen_sctp:send/4.
  531: def_sndrcvinfo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  532:     Loopback = {127,0,0,1},
  533:     Data = <<"What goes up, must come down.">>,
  534:     %%
  535:     S1 =
  536: 	log_ok(gen_sctp:open(
  537: 		 0, [{sctp_default_send_param,#sctp_sndrcvinfo{ppid=17}}])),
  538:     ?LOGVAR(S1),
  539:     P1 =
  540: 	log_ok(inet:port(S1)),
  541:     ?LOGVAR(P1),
  542:     #sctp_sndrcvinfo{ppid=17, context=0, timetolive=0, assoc_id=0} =
  543: 	getopt(S1, sctp_default_send_param),
  544:     ok =
  545: 	gen_sctp:listen(S1, true),
  546:     %%
  547:     S2 =
  548: 	log_ok(gen_sctp:open()),
  549:     ?LOGVAR(S2),
  550:     P2 =
  551: 	log_ok(inet:port(S2)),
  552:     ?LOGVAR(P2),
  553:     #sctp_sndrcvinfo{ppid=0, context=0, timetolive=0, assoc_id=0} =
  554: 	getopt(S2, sctp_default_send_param),
  555:     %%
  556:     #sctp_assoc_change{
  557:        state=comm_up,
  558:        error=0,
  559:        assoc_id=S2AssocId} = S2AssocChange =
  560: 	log_ok(gen_sctp:connect(S2, Loopback, P1, [])),
  561:     ?LOGVAR(S2AssocChange),
  562:     S1AssocId =
  563: 	case recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S1))) of
  564: 	    {Loopback,P2,
  565: 	     #sctp_assoc_change{
  566: 		state=comm_up,
  567: 		error=0,
  568: 		assoc_id=AssocId}} ->
  569: 		AssocId;
  570: 	    {Loopback,P2,
  571: 	     #sctp_paddr_change{
  572: 		state=addr_confirmed,
  573: 		error=0,
  574: 		assoc_id=AssocId}} ->
  575: 		{Loopback,P2,
  576: 		 #sctp_assoc_change{
  577: 		    state=comm_up,
  578: 		    error=0,
  579: 		    assoc_id=AssocId}} =
  580: 		    recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S1))),
  581: 		AssocId
  582: 	end,
  583:     ?LOGVAR(S1AssocId),
  584: 
  585:     #sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  586:        ppid=17, context=0, timetolive=0} = %, assoc_id=S1AssocId} =
  587: 	getopt(
  588: 	  S1, sctp_default_send_param, #sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=S1AssocId}),
  589:     #sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  590:        ppid=0, context=0, timetolive=0} = %, assoc_id=S2AssocId} =
  591: 	getopt(
  592: 	  S2, sctp_default_send_param, #sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=S2AssocId}),
  593:     %%
  594:     ok =
  595: 	gen_sctp:send(S1, S1AssocId, 1, <<"1: ",Data/binary>>),
  596:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S2)) of
  597: 	{Loopback,P1,
  598: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  599: 	     stream=1, ppid=17, context=0, assoc_id=S2AssocId}],
  600: 	 <<"1: ",Data/binary>>} -> ok;
  601: 	Event1 ->
  602: 	    {Loopback,P1,
  603: 	     #sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_confirmed,
  604: 				addr={_,P1},
  605: 				error=0,
  606: 				assoc_id=S2AssocId}} =
  607: 		recv_event(Event1),
  608: 	    {Loopback,P1,
  609: 	     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  610: 		 stream=1, ppid=17, context=0, assoc_id=S2AssocId}],
  611: 	     <<"1: ",Data/binary>>} =
  612: 		log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S2))
  613:     end,
  614:     %%
  615:     ok =
  616: 	setopt(
  617: 	  S1, sctp_default_send_param, #sctp_sndrcvinfo{ppid=18}),
  618:     ok =
  619: 	setopt(
  620: 	  S1, sctp_default_send_param,
  621: 	  #sctp_sndrcvinfo{ppid=19, assoc_id=S1AssocId}),
  622:     #sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  623:        ppid=18, context=0, timetolive=0, assoc_id=0} =
  624: 	getopt(S1, sctp_default_send_param),
  625:     #sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  626:        ppid=19, context=0, timetolive=0, assoc_id=S1AssocId} =
  627: 	getopt(
  628: 	  S1, sctp_default_send_param, #sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=S1AssocId}),
  629:     %%
  630:     ok =
  631: 	gen_sctp:send(S1, S1AssocId, 0, <<"2: ",Data/binary>>),
  632:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S2)) of
  633: 	{Loopback,P1,
  634: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  635: 	     stream=0, ppid=19, context=0, assoc_id=S2AssocId}],
  636: 	 <<"2: ",Data/binary>>} -> ok
  637:     end,
  638:     ok =
  639: 	gen_sctp:send(S2, S2AssocChange, 1, <<"3: ",Data/binary>>),
  640:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S1)) of
  641: 	{Loopback,P2,
  642: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  643: 	     stream=1, ppid=0, context=0, assoc_id=S1AssocId}],
  644: 	 <<"3: ",Data/binary>>} -> ok;
  645: 	Event2 ->
  646: 	    case recv_event(Event2) of
  647: 		{Loopback,P2,
  648: 		 #sctp_paddr_change{
  649: 		    addr={Loopback,_},
  650: 		    state=State,
  651: 		    error=0, assoc_id=S1AssocId}}
  652: 		  when State =:= addr_available;
  653: 		       State =:= addr_confirmed ->
  654: 		    case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S1)) of
  655: 			{Loopback,P2,
  656: 			 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  657: 			     stream=1, ppid=0, context=0,
  658: 			     assoc_id=S1AssocId}],
  659: 			 <<"3: ",Data/binary>>} -> ok
  660: 		    end
  661: 	    end
  662:     end,
  663:     ok =
  664: 	do_from_other_process(
  665: 	  fun () ->
  666: 		  gen_sctp:send(
  667: 		    S2,
  668: 		    #sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=0, ppid=20, assoc_id=S2AssocId},
  669: 		    <<"4: ",Data/binary>>)
  670: 	  end),
  671:     case log_ok(do_from_other_process(fun() -> gen_sctp:recv(S1) end)) of
  672: 	{Loopback,P2,
  673: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  674: 	     stream=0, ppid=20, context=0, assoc_id=S1AssocId}],
  675: 	 <<"4: ",Data/binary>>} -> ok
  676:     end,
  677:     %%
  678:     ok =
  679: 	gen_sctp:close(S1),
  680:     ok =
  681: 	gen_sctp:close(S2),
  682:     receive
  683: 	Msg ->
  684: 	    ct:fail({received,Msg})
  685:     after 17 -> ok
  686:     end,
  687:     ok.
  688: 
  689: getopt(S, Opt) ->
  690:     {ok,[{Opt,Val}]} = inet:getopts(S, [Opt]),
  691:     Val.
  692: 
  693: getopt(S, Opt, Param) ->
  694:     {ok,[{Opt,Val}]} = inet:getopts(S, [{Opt,Param}]),
  695:     Val.
  696: 
  697: setopt(S, Opt, Val) ->
  698:     inet:setopts(S, [{Opt,Val}]).
  699: 
  700: 
  701: flush() ->
  702:     receive
  703: 	Msg ->
  704: 	    [Msg|flush()]
  705:     after 17 ->
  706: 	    []
  707:     end.
  708: 
  709: %% Test the API function open/1,2 and close/1.
  710: api_open_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  711:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, fun() -> do_api_open_close() end).
  712: 
  713: do_api_open_close() ->
  714:     {ok,S1} = gen_sctp:open(0),
  715:     {ok,P}  = inet:port(S1),
  716:     ok      = gen_sctp:close(S1),
  717: 
  718:     {ok,S2} = gen_sctp:open(P),
  719:     {ok,P}  = inet:port(S2),
  720:     ok      = gen_sctp:close(S2),
  721: 
  722:     {ok,S3} = gen_sctp:open([{port,P}]),
  723:     {ok,P}  = inet:port(S3),
  724:     ok      = gen_sctp:close(S3),
  725: 
  726:     {ok,S4} = gen_sctp:open(P, []),
  727:     {ok,P}  = inet:port(S4),
  728:     ok      = gen_sctp:close(S4),
  729: 
  730:     {ok,S5} = gen_sctp:open(P, [{debug, false}, {ifaddr,any}, {debug, true}]),
  731:     {ok,P}  = inet:port(S5),
  732:     ok      = gen_sctp:close(S5),
  733: 
  734:     ok      = gen_sctp:close(S5),
  735: 
  736:     try gen_sctp:close(0)
  737:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  738:     end,
  739: 
  740:     try gen_sctp:open({})
  741:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  742:     end,
  743: 
  744:     try gen_sctp:open(-1)
  745:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  746:     end,
  747: 
  748:     try gen_sctp:open(65536)
  749:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  750:     end,
  751: 
  752:     try gen_sctp:open(make_ref(), [])
  753:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  754:     end,
  755: 
  756:     try gen_sctp:open(0, {})
  757:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  758:     end,
  759: 
  760:     try gen_sctp:open(0, [make_ref()])
  761:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  762:     end,
  763: 
  764:     try gen_sctp:open([{invalid_option,0}])
  765:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  766:     end,
  767: 
  768:     try gen_sctp:open(0, [{mode,invalid_mode}])
  769:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  770:     end,
  771:     ok.
  772: 
  773: %% Test the API function listen/2.
  774: api_listen(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  775:     Localhost = {127,0,0,1},
  776: 
  777:     try gen_sctp:listen(0, true)
  778:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  779:     end,
  780: 
  781:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open(),
  782:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(S),
  783:     try gen_sctp:listen(S, not_allowed_for_listen)
  784:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  785:     end,
  786:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S),
  787:     {error,closed} = gen_sctp:listen(S, true),
  788: 
  789:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open(Pb),
  790:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open(),
  791: 
  792:     element(1, os:type()) =:= unix andalso
  793:         begin
  794:             {error, nxdomain} = gen_sctp:connect(Sa, "", 65535, []),
  795:             {error, nxdomain} = gen_sctp:connect(Sa, '', 65535, [])
  796:         end,
  797:     {error, nxdomain} = gen_sctp:connect(Sa, ".", 65535, []),
  798:     {error, nxdomain} = gen_sctp:connect(Sa, '.', 65535, []),
  799: 
  800:     case gen_sctp:connect(Sa, localhost, Pb, []) of
  801: 	{error,econnrefused} ->
  802: 	    {ok,{Localhost,
  803: 		 Pb,[],
  804: 		 #sctp_assoc_change{
  805: 		    state=comm_lost}}} =
  806: 		gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity);
  807: 	{error,#sctp_assoc_change{state=cant_assoc}} ->
  808: 	    ok%;
  809: 	    %% {error,{Localhost,Pb,_,#sctp_assoc_change{state=cant_assoc}}} ->
  810: 	    %% 	  ok
  811:     end,
  812:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
  813:     {ok,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
  814: 			   error=0}} =
  815: 	gen_sctp:connect(Sa, localhost, Pb, []),
  816:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
  817:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb),
  818:     ok.
  819: 
  820: %% Test the API function connect_init/4.
  821: api_connect_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  822:     Localhost = {127,0,0,1},
  823: 
  824:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open(),
  825:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(S),
  826:     try gen_sctp:connect_init(S, Localhost, not_allowed_for_port, [])
  827:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  828:     end,
  829:     try gen_sctp:connect_init(S, Localhost, 12345, not_allowed_for_opts)
  830:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  831:     end,
  832:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S),
  833:     {error,closed} = gen_sctp:connect_init(S, Localhost, 12345, []),
  834: 
  835:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open(Pb),
  836:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open(),
  837:     case gen_sctp:connect_init(Sa, localhost, Pb, []) of
  838: 	{error,econnrefused} ->
  839: 	    {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_lost}} =
  840: 		recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity)));
  841: 	ok ->
  842: 	    {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=cant_assoc}} =
  843: 		recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity)))
  844:     end,
  845:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
  846:     case gen_sctp:connect_init(Sa, localhost, Pb, []) of
  847: 	ok ->
  848: 	    {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up}} =
  849: 		recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity)))
  850:     end,
  851:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
  852:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb),
  853:     ok.
  854: 
  855: %% Test the API function connectx_init/4.
  856: api_connectx_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  857:     Localhost = {127,0,0,1},
  858: 
  859:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open(),
  860:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(S),
  861:     try ?no_return(gen_sctp:connectx_init(S, Localhost, 12345, []))
  862:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  863:     end,
  864:     {error, einval} = gen_sctp:connectx_init(S, [Localhost], not_allowed_for_port, []),
  865:     %% try ?no_return(gen_sctp:connectx_init(S, [Localhost], not_allowed_for_port, []))
  866:     %% catch error:badarg -> ok
  867:     %% end,
  868:     try ?no_return(gen_sctp:connectx_init(S, [Localhost], 12345, not_allowed_for_opts))
  869:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  870:     end,
  871:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S),
  872:     {error,closed} = gen_sctp:connectx_init(S, [Localhost], 12345, []),
  873: 
  874:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open(Pb),
  875:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open(),
  876:     {ok, A1} = gen_sctp:connectx_init(Sa, [localhost], Pb, []),
  877:     true = (A1 =/= 0),
  878:     {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=cant_assoc, assoc_id = A1}} =
  879: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))),
  880:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
  881:     {ok, A2} = gen_sctp:connectx_init(Sa, [localhost], Pb, []),
  882:     true = (A2 =/= 0),
  883:     {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up, assoc_id = A2}} =
  884: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))),
  885:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
  886:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb),
  887:     ok.
  888: 
  889: recv_event({Addr, Port, [], #sctp_assoc_change{} = AssocChange}) ->
  890:     {Addr, Port, AssocChange};
  891: recv_event({Addr,Port,
  892: 	    [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id  = Assoc}],
  893: 	    #sctp_assoc_change{assoc_id = Assoc} = AssocChange}) ->
  894:     {Addr, Port, AssocChange};
  895: recv_event({Addr, Port, [], #sctp_paddr_change{} = PaddrChange}) ->
  896:     {Addr, Port, PaddrChange};
  897: recv_event({Addr, Port,
  898: 	    [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id  = Assoc}],
  899: 	    #sctp_paddr_change{assoc_id = Assoc} = PaddrChange}) ->
  900:     {Addr, Port, PaddrChange};
  901: recv_event({Addr, Port, [], #sctp_shutdown_event{} = ShutdownEvent}) ->
  902:     {Addr, Port, ShutdownEvent};
  903: recv_event({Addr, Port,
  904: 	    [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id    = Assoc}],
  905: 	    #sctp_shutdown_event{assoc_id = Assoc} = ShutdownEvent}) ->
  906:     {Addr, Port, ShutdownEvent}.
  907: 
  908: %% Test socket options.
  909: api_opts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  910:     Sndbuf = 32768,
  911:     Recbuf = 65536,
  912:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open(0),
  913:     OSType = os:type(),
  914:     case {inet:setopts(S, [{linger,{true,2}}]),OSType} of
  915: 	{ok,_} ->
  916: 	    ok;
  917: 	{{error,einval},{unix,sunos}} ->
  918: 	    ok
  919:     end,
  920:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{sndbuf,Sndbuf}]),
  921:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{recbuf,Recbuf}]),
  922:     case inet:getopts(S, [sndbuf]) of
  923: 	{ok, [{sndbuf,SB}]} when SB >= Sndbuf -> ok
  924:     end,
  925:     case inet:getopts(S, [recbuf]) of
  926: 	{ok, [{recbuf, RB}]} when (RB >= Recbuf) -> ok
  927:     end.
  928: 
  929: %% What is this *actually* supposed to test?
  930: implicit_inet6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  931:     ?TC_TRY(implicit_inet6, fun() -> do_implicit_inet6(Config) end).
  932: 
  933: do_implicit_inet6(_Config) ->
  934:     ?P("begin"),
  935:     %% First
  936:     ?P("try create server socket (1)"),
  937:     case gen_sctp:open(0, [inet6]) of
  938: 	{ok, S1} ->
  939:             Loopback = {0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1},
  940:             ?P("*** ~s: ~p ***", ["Loopback", Loopback]),
  941:             implicit_inet6(S1, Loopback),
  942:             ok = gen_sctp:close(S1),
  943:             
  944:             %% Second
  945:             ?P("try create server socket (2)"),
  946:             Localhost =
  947:                 case inet:getaddr("localhost", inet6) of
  948:                     {ok, LH} ->
  949:                         LH;
  950:                     {error, nxdomain = Reason_getaddr} ->
  951:                         ?SKIPT(Reason_getaddr);
  952:                     {error, Reason_getaddr} ->
  953:                         ct:fail({unexpected, Reason_getaddr})
  954:                 end,
  955:             S2 = case gen_sctp:open(0, [{ip, Localhost}]) of
  956:                      {ok, S} ->
  957:                          S;
  958:                      {error, nxdomain = Reason_open} ->
  959:                          ?SKIPT(Reason_open);
  960:                      {error, Reason_open} ->
  961:                          ct:fail({unexpected, Reason_open})
  962:                  end,
  963: 
  964:             ?P("*** ~s: ~p ***", ["localhost", Localhost]),
  965:             implicit_inet6(S2, Localhost),
  966:             ok = gen_sctp:close(S2),
  967:             
  968:             %% Third
  969:             ?P("try create server socket (3)"),
  970:             Hostname = log_ok(inet:gethostname()),
  971:             Addr     = case inet:getaddr(Hostname, inet6) of
  972:                            {ok, A} ->
  973:                                A;
  974:                            {error, eafnosupport} ->
  975:                                ok = gen_sctp:close(S1),
  976:                                ?SKIPT("Can not look up IPv6 address")
  977:                        end,
  978:             S3 = log_ok(gen_sctp:open(0, [{ifaddr, Addr}])),
  979:             ?P("*** ~s: ~p ***", [Hostname, Addr]),
  980:             implicit_inet6(S3, Addr),
  981:             ok = gen_sctp:close(S1),
  982:             ?P("done"),
  983:             ok;
  984:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
  985:             ?SKIPT(open_failed_str(Reason));
  986:         _ ->
  987:             {skip, "IPv6 not supported"}
  988:     end.
  989: 
  990: 
  991: implicit_inet6(S1, Addr) ->
  992:     ?P("make (server) listen socket"),
  993:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(S1, true),
  994:     ServerPortNo = log_ok(inet:port(S1)),
  995:     ?P("try create (client) socket"),
  996:     S2 = case gen_sctp:open(0, [inet6, {ifaddr, Addr}]) of
  997:              {ok, Sock} ->
  998:                  ?P("client socket created: ~p", [Sock]),
  999:                  Sock;
 1000:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 1001:                  ?P("could not create (client) socket with ifaddr: "
 1002:                     "~n   ~p", [Addr]),
 1003:                  ?SKIPT(open_failed_str(Reason))
 1004:     end,
 1005:     {ClientAddr, ClientPortNo} = log_ok(inet:sockname(S2)),
 1006:     ?P("try connect"
 1007:        "~n   from (connector): ~p, ~p (~p)"
 1008:        "~n   to:               ~p, ~p",
 1009:        [ClientAddr, ClientPortNo, S2, Addr, ServerPortNo]),
 1010:     #sctp_assoc_change{state = comm_up} =
 1011: 	log_ok(gen_sctp:connect(S2, Addr, ServerPortNo, [])),
 1012:     ?P("connect success: await events"),
 1013:     implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(S1, ClientAddr, ClientPortNo),
 1014:     ?P("verify server sockname"),
 1015:     case log_ok(inet:sockname(S1)) of
 1016: 	{Addr,              ServerPortNo} -> ok;
 1017: 	{{0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0}, ServerPortNo} -> ok
 1018:     end,
 1019:     ?P("verify client sockname"),
 1020:     case log_ok(inet:sockname(S2)) of
 1021: 	{Addr,              ClientPortNo} -> ok;
 1022: 	{{0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0}, ClientPortNo} -> ok
 1023:     end,
 1024:     ?P("client client socket"),
 1025:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S2),
 1026:     ?P("verification complete"),
 1027:     ok.
 1028: 
 1029: 
 1030: implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(Sock, Addr, PortNo) ->
 1031:     {_OsFam, OsName} = os:type(),
 1032:     implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(Sock, Addr, PortNo, OsName).
 1033: 
 1034: implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(Sock, Addr, PortNo, OsName) ->
 1035:     case recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sock))) of
 1036: 	{Addr, PortNo, #sctp_assoc_change{state = comm_up}} ->
 1037:             ?P("received assoc-change:comm-up event => done"),
 1038: 	    ok;
 1039: 	{Addr, PortNo, #sctp_paddr_change{state = addr_confirmed,
 1040:                                           addr  = {Addr, PortNo},
 1041:                                           error = 0}} ->
 1042:             ?P("received paddr-change:addr-confirmed event - "
 1043:                "try recv assoc-change:comm-up"),
 1044:             implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(Sock, Addr, PortNo, OsName);
 1045: 
 1046: 	{Addr2, PortNo2, #sctp_assoc_change{state = comm_up}}
 1047:           when (OsName =:= freebsd) ->
 1048:             ?P("Expected (assoc-change:comm-up) event from unexpected address: "
 1049:                "~n   Unexpected Address: ~p, ~p"
 1050:                "~n   Expected Address:   ~p, ~p"
 1051:                "~n   => RETRY"
 1052:                "~n", [Addr2, PortNo2, Addr, PortNo]),
 1053:             implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(Sock, Addr, PortNo, OsName);
 1054: 	{Addr2, PortNo2, #sctp_paddr_change{state = addr_confirmed}}
 1055:           when (OsName =:= freebsd) ->
 1056:             ?P("Expected paddr-change:addr-confirmed event from "
 1057:                "UNEXPECTED ADDRESS: "
 1058:                "~n   UNEXPECTED Address: ~p, ~p"
 1059:                "~n   Expected Address:   ~p, ~p"
 1060:                "~n   => RETRY"
 1061:                "~n", [Addr2, PortNo2, Addr, PortNo]),
 1062:             implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(Sock, Addr, PortNo, OsName);
 1063: 
 1064: 	{Addr2, PortNo2, #sctp_assoc_change{state = comm_up} = CX} = UNEX ->
 1065:             ?P("Expected (assoc-change:comm-up) event from UNEXPECTED ADDRESS: "
 1066:                "~n   UNEXPECTED Address: ~p, ~p"
 1067:                "~n   Expected Address:   ~p, ~p"
 1068:                "~n   Assoc Change:       ~p"
 1069:                "~n", [Addr2, PortNo2, Addr, PortNo, CX]),
 1070:             exit({unexpected_event, UNEX});
 1071: 
 1072: 	{AX, PX, #sctp_paddr_change{state = addr_confirmed} = CX} = UNEX ->
 1073:             ?P("Expected paddr-change:addr-confirmed event from "
 1074:                "UNEXPECTED ADDRESS: "
 1075:                "~n   UNEXPECTED Address: ~p, ~p"
 1076:                "~n   Expected Address:   ~p, ~p"
 1077:                "~n   PAddr Change:       ~p"
 1078:                "~n", [AX, PX, Addr, PortNo, CX]),
 1079:             exit({unexpected_event, UNEX});
 1080: 
 1081:         {AX, PX, CX} = UNEX ->
 1082:             ?P("UNEXPECTED EVENT: "
 1083:                "~n   ~p"
 1084:                "~n   UNEXPECTED ADDRESS: ~p, ~p"
 1085:                "~n   Expected Address:   ~p, ~p"
 1086:                "~n", [CX, AX, PX, Addr, PortNo]),
 1087:             exit({unexpected_event, UNEX})
 1088:     end.
 1089: 
 1090: 
 1091: %% Verify {active, N} socket management.
 1092: %% This is difficult to do since we do not just receive data messages.
 1093: %% Also, how do we know that sctp behaves the same way on all platforms?
 1094: active_n(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1095:     ?TC_TRY(active_n, fun() -> do_active_n(Config) end).
 1096: 
 1097: do_active_n(_Config) ->
 1098:     N = 3,
 1099:     S1 = ok(gen_sctp:open([{active,N}])),
 1100:     [{active,N}] = ok(inet:getopts(S1, [active])),
 1101:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,-N}]),
 1102:     receive
 1103:         {sctp_passive, S1} -> ok
 1104:     after
 1105:         5000 ->
 1106:             exit({error,sctp_passive_failure})
 1107:     end,
 1108:     [{active,false}] = ok(inet:getopts(S1, [active])),
 1109:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,0}]),
 1110:     receive
 1111:         {sctp_passive, S1} -> ok
 1112:     after
 1113:         5000 ->
 1114:             exit({error,sctp_passive_failure})
 1115:     end,
 1116:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,32767}]),
 1117:     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,1}]),
 1118:     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,-32769}]),
 1119:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,-32768}]),
 1120:     receive
 1121:         {sctp_passive, S1} -> ok
 1122:     after
 1123:         5000 ->
 1124:             exit({error,sctp_passive_failure})
 1125:     end,
 1126:     [{active,false}] = ok(inet:getopts(S1, [active])),
 1127:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,N}]),
 1128:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,true}]),
 1129:     [{active,true}] = ok(inet:getopts(S1, [active])),
 1130:     receive
 1131:         _ -> exit({error,active_n})
 1132:     after
 1133:         0 ->
 1134:             ok
 1135:     end,
 1136:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,N}]),
 1137:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,once}]),
 1138:     [{active,once}] = ok(inet:getopts(S1, [active])),
 1139:     receive
 1140:         _ -> exit({error,active_n})
 1141:     after
 1142:         0 ->
 1143:             ok
 1144:     end,
 1145:     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,32768}]),
 1146:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,false}]),
 1147:     [{active,false}] = ok(inet:getopts(S1, [active])),
 1148:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(S1, true),
 1149:     S1Port = ok(inet:port(S1)),
 1150:     S2 = ok(gen_sctp:open(0, [{active,false}])),
 1151:     Assoc = ok(gen_sctp:connect(S2, "localhost", S1Port, [])),
 1152:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,N}]),
 1153:     active_n_flush_connect_msgs(S1),
 1154:     active_n_send_loop(N, S2, Assoc, S1),
 1155:     S3 = ok(gen_sctp:open([{active,0}])),
 1156:     receive
 1157:         {sctp_passive,S3} ->
 1158:             [{active,false}] = ok(inet:getopts(S3, [active]))
 1159:     after
 1160:         5000 ->
 1161:             exit({error,udp_passive})
 1162:     end,
 1163:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S3),
 1164:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S2),
 1165:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S1),
 1166:     ok.
 1167: 
 1168: 
 1169: %% There is no way to know how many addresses this host has,
 1170: %% and if there is "too many" (more then N = 3), then the
 1171: %% socket may already be passive. In this case the send-
 1172: %% loop will fail.
 1173: %% So, if we get a passive-message here, we just give up (=skip).
 1174: active_n_flush_connect_msgs(Sock) ->
 1175:     %% This seems only to be needed on certain platforms
 1176:     active_n_flush_connect_msgs(os:type(), Sock).
 1177: 
 1178: active_n_flush_connect_msgs(_, Sock) ->
 1179:     do_active_n_flush_connect_msgs(Sock).
 1180: %% active_n_flush_connect_msgs({unix, freebsd}, Sock) ->
 1181: %%     do_active_n_flush_connect_msgs(Sock);
 1182: %% active_n_flush_connect_msgs(_, _) ->
 1183: %%     ok.
 1184: 
 1185: do_active_n_flush_connect_msgs(Sock) ->
 1186:     receive
 1187:         {sctp_passive, Sock} ->
 1188:             ?P("connect-flush-loop -> premature passive"),
 1189:             ?SKIPT("Too many addresses (premature passive)");
 1190: 
 1191:         {sctp, Sock,
 1192:          _FromIP, _FromPort,
 1193:          {[], #sctp_assoc_change{state = comm_up}}} ->
 1194:             ?P("connect-flush-loop -> "
 1195:                "connect message discard - assoc change : comm-up"),
 1196:             ok = inet:setopts(Sock, [{active, 1}]),
 1197:             do_active_n_flush_connect_msgs(Sock);
 1198: 
 1199:         {sctp, Sock,
 1200:          _FromIP, _FromPort,
 1201:          {[], #sctp_paddr_change{state    = addr_confirmed,
 1202:                                  addr     = Addr,
 1203:                                  error    = Error,
 1204:                                  assoc_id = AID}}} ->
 1205:             ?P("connect-flush-loop -> "
 1206:                "connect message discard - paddr change : addr-confirmed:"
 1207:                "~n   Addr:    ~p"
 1208:                "~n   Error:   ~p"
 1209:                "~n   AssocID: ~p", [Addr, Error, AID]),
 1210:             ok = inet:setopts(Sock, [{active, 1}]),
 1211:             do_active_n_flush_connect_msgs(Sock)
 1212: 
 1213:     after 5000 ->
 1214:             ok
 1215:     end.
 1216:             
 1217: active_n_send_loop(Count, SrcSock, SndAssoc, DstSock) ->
 1218:     active_n_send_loop(0, Count, SrcSock, SndAssoc, DstSock).
 1219: 
 1220: active_n_send_loop(Count, Count, _SndSock, _SndAssoc, RcvSock) ->
 1221:     ?P("send-loop -> we are done - wait for passive"),
 1222:     receive
 1223:         {sctp_passive, RcvSock} ->
 1224:             ?P("received passive"),
 1225:             ok
 1226:     after
 1227:         5000 ->
 1228:             ?P("UNEXPECTED TIMEOUT: "
 1229:                "~n   Message Queue:    ~p"
 1230:                "~n   Active:           ~p",
 1231:                [process_info(self(), messages),
 1232:                 inet:getopts(RcvSock, [active])]),
 1233:             exit({error, timeout})
 1234:     end;
 1235: 
 1236: active_n_send_loop(Sent, Count, SndSock, SndAssoc, RcvSock) ->
 1237:     Msg = list_to_binary("message " ++ integer_to_list(Sent+1)),
 1238:     ?P("send-loop(~w,~w) -> send message (on ~p)", [Sent, Count, SndSock]),
 1239:     ok = gen_sctp:send(SndSock, SndAssoc, 0, Msg),
 1240:     receive
 1241:         {sctp, RcvSock, FromIP, FromPort, {[SR], Msg}}
 1242:         when is_record(SR, sctp_sndrcvinfo) ->
 1243:             ?P("send-loop(~w,~w) -> "
 1244:                "recv (expected) data message (on ~p):"
 1245:                "~n   Msg:  ~p"
 1246:                "~n   From: ~p, ~p",
 1247:                [Sent, Count,
 1248:                 RcvSock, Msg, FromIP, FromPort]),
 1249:             active_n_send_loop(Sent+1, Count, SndSock, SndAssoc, RcvSock);
 1250:         
 1251:         {sctp, RcvSock, _FromIP, _FromPort, {_AncData, _Data}} ->
 1252:             %% ignore non-data messages
 1253:             %% we should not get any here because of the flush loop,
 1254:             %% but just in case...
 1255:             ?P("send-loop(~w,~w) -> "
 1256:                "ignore non-data messages (on ~p):"
 1257:                "~n   From:    ~p:~p"
 1258:                "~n   AncData: ~p"
 1259:                "~n   Data:    ~p",
 1260:                [Sent, Count,
 1261:                 RcvSock, _FromIP, _FromPort, _AncData, _Data]),
 1262:             
 1263:             %% It may be too late to update here,
 1264:             %% the socket may already have gone passive 
 1265:             %% and generated a passive message!
 1266:             
 1267:             ok = inet:setopts(RcvSock, [{active, 1}]),
 1268: 
 1269:             active_n_send_loop(Sent, Count, SndSock, SndAssoc, RcvSock);
 1270:         
 1271:         Other ->
 1272:             ?P("send-loop(~w,~w) -> "
 1273:                "UNEXPECTED: "
 1274:                "~n   Other:     ~p"
 1275:                "~n   Send Sock: ~p"
 1276:                "~n   Recv Sock: ~p", [Sent, Count,
 1277:                                       Other, SndSock, RcvSock]),
 1278:             exit({unexpected, Other})
 1279:     after
 1280:         5000 ->
 1281:             exit({error,timeout})
 1282:     end.
 1283:     
 1284: %% Hello world stream socket.
 1285: basic_stream(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1286:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open([{type,stream}]),
 1287:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(S, true),
 1288:     ok =
 1289: 	do_from_other_process(
 1290: 	  fun () -> gen_sctp:listen(S, 10) end),
 1291:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S),
 1292:     ok.
 1293: 
 1294: %% Minimal data transfer.
 1295: xfer_stream_min(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1296:     {_, OSName} = os:type(),
 1297:     Stream = 0,
 1298:     Data = <<"The quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog 0123456789">>,
 1299:     Loopback = {127,0,0,1},
 1300:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open([{type,seqpacket}]),
 1301:     ?LOGVAR(Sb),
 1302:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(Sb),
 1303:     ?LOGVAR(Pb),
 1304:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
 1305: 
 1306:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open([{type,stream}]),
 1307:     ?LOGVAR(Sa),
 1308:     {ok,Pa} = inet:port(Sa),
 1309:     ?LOGVAR(Pa),
 1310:     #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
 1311: 		       error=0,
 1312: 		       outbound_streams=SaOutboundStreams,
 1313: 		       inbound_streams=SaInboundStreams,
 1314: 		       assoc_id=SaAssocId_X} =
 1315: 	log_ok(gen_sctp:connect(Sa, Loopback, Pb, [])),
 1316:     ?LOGVAR(SaAssocId_X),
 1317:     [{_,#sctp_paddrinfo{assoc_id=SaAssocId,state=active}}] =
 1318: 	log_ok(inet:getopts(Sa, [{sctp_get_peer_addr_info,
 1319: 				  #sctp_paddrinfo{address={Loopback,Pb}}}])),
 1320:     ?LOGVAR(SaAssocId),
 1321:     match_unless_solaris(SaAssocId_X, SaAssocId),
 1322: 
 1323:     {SbOutboundStreams,SbInboundStreams,SbAssocId} =
 1324: 	case recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))) of
 1325: 	    {Loopback,Pa,
 1326: 	     #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
 1327: 				error=0,
 1328: 				outbound_streams=OS,
 1329: 				inbound_streams=IS,
 1330: 				assoc_id=AI}} ->
 1331: 		{OS,IS,AI};
 1332: 	    {Loopback,Pa,
 1333: 	     #sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_confirmed,
 1334: 				addr={Loopback,Pa},
 1335: 				error=0,
 1336: 				assoc_id=AI}} ->
 1337: 		{Loopback,Pa,
 1338: 		 #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
 1339: 				    error=0,
 1340: 				    outbound_streams=OS,
 1341: 				    inbound_streams=IS,
 1342: 				    assoc_id=AI}} =
 1343: 		    recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))),
 1344: 		{OS,IS,AI}
 1345: 	end,
 1346:     ?LOGVAR(SbAssocId),
 1347:     SaOutboundStreams = SbInboundStreams,
 1348:     ?LOGVAR(SaOutboundStreams),
 1349:     SbOutboundStreams = SaInboundStreams,
 1350:     ?LOGVAR(SbOutboundStreams),
 1351:     ok = gen_sctp:send(Sa, SaAssocId, 0, Data),
 1352:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity)) of
 1353: 	{Loopback,
 1354: 	 Pa,
 1355: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream   = Stream,
 1356: 			   assoc_id = SbAssocId}],
 1357: 	 Data} ->
 1358:             ?P("[1] received expected data with ancillary data => done"),
 1359:             ok;
 1360: 
 1361: 	{Loopback,
 1362: 	 Pa,
 1363:          [],
 1364: 	 #sctp_paddr_change{addr     = {Loopback,_},
 1365: 			    state    = addr_available,
 1366: 			    error    = 0,
 1367: 			    assoc_id = SbAssocId}} ->
 1368:             ?P("[2] received paddr change => recv again"),
 1369:             Res2 = log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity)),
 1370:             ?P("[2] recv ok => "
 1371:                "~n   ~p", [Res2]),
 1372: 	    {Loopback,
 1373: 	     Pa,
 1374: 	     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream   = Stream,
 1375: 			       assoc_id = SbAssocId}],
 1376: 	     Data} = Res2,
 1377:             ?P("[2] received expected data with ancillary data => done"),
 1378:             Res2;
 1379: 
 1380: 	{Loopback,
 1381: 	 Pa,
 1382: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream    = Stream,
 1383: 			   assoc_id  = SbAssocId}],
 1384: 	 #sctp_paddr_change{addr     = {Loopback,_},
 1385: 			    state    = addr_confirmed,
 1386: 			    error    = 0,
 1387: 			    assoc_id = SbAssocId}} ->
 1388:             ?P("[3] received paddr change with ancillary data => recv again"),
 1389:             Res3 = log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity)),
 1390:             ?P("[3] recv ok => "
 1391:                "~n   ~p", [Res3]),
 1392: 	    {Loopback,
 1393: 	     Pa,
 1394: 	     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream   = Stream,
 1395: 			       assoc_id = SbAssocId}],
 1396: 	     Data} = Res3,
 1397:             ?P("[3] received expected data with ancillary data => done"),
 1398:             Res3;
 1399: 
 1400:         %% It seems that on FreeBSD (for instance) we don't get any
 1401:         %% AncData with this.
 1402: 	{Loopback,
 1403: 	 Pa,
 1404: 	 [],
 1405: 	 #sctp_paddr_change{addr     = {Loopback,_},
 1406: 			    state    = addr_confirmed,
 1407: 			    error    = 0,
 1408: 			    assoc_id = SbAssocId}} when (OSName =:= freebsd) ->
 1409:             ?P("[4] received paddr change without ancillary data => "
 1410:                "recv again"),
 1411:             Res4 = log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity)),
 1412:             ?P("[4] recv ok => "
 1413:                "~n   ~p", [Res4]),
 1414: 	    {Loopback,
 1415: 	     Pa,
 1416: 	     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream   = Stream,
 1417:                                assoc_id = SbAssocId}],
 1418: 	     Data} = Res4,
 1419:             ?P("[4] received expected data with ancillary data => done"),
 1420:             Res4;
 1421: 
 1422:         {FromIPX, FromPortX, AncDataX, DataX} = Other1 ->
 1423:             ?P("UNEXPECTED: "
 1424:                "~n   FromIP:   ~p"
 1425:                "~n   FromPort: ~p"
 1426:                "~n   AncData:  ~p"
 1427:                "~n   Data:     ~p"
 1428:                "~nwhen"
 1429:                "~n   Loopback: ~p"
 1430:                "~n   Pa:       ~p",
 1431:                [FromIPX, FromPortX, AncDataX, DataX, Loopback, Pa]),
 1432:             exit({unexpected, Other1});
 1433:         Other2 ->
 1434:             ?P("UNEXPECTED: "
 1435:                "~n   Other:    ~p"
 1436:                "~nwhen"
 1437:                "~n   Loopback: ~p"
 1438:                "~n   Pa:       ~p",
 1439:                [Other2, Loopback, Pa]),
 1440:             exit({unexpected, Other2})
 1441:     end,
 1442:     ok =
 1443: 	do_from_other_process(
 1444: 	  fun () -> gen_sctp:send(Sb, SbAssocId, 0, Data) end),
 1445:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity)) of
 1446: 	{Loopback,Pb,
 1447: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
 1448: 			   assoc_id=SaAssocId}],
 1449: 	 Data} -> ok;
 1450: 	Event1 ->
 1451: 	    {Loopback,Pb,
 1452: 	     #sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_confirmed,
 1453: 				addr={_,Pb},
 1454: 				error=0,
 1455: 				assoc_id=SaAssocId}} =
 1456: 		recv_event(Event1),
 1457: 	    {Loopback,Pb,
 1458: 	     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
 1459: 			       assoc_id=SaAssocId}],
 1460: 	     Data} =
 1461: 		log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))
 1462:     end,
 1463:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
 1464:     {Loopback,Pa,
 1465:      #sctp_shutdown_event{assoc_id=SbAssocId}} =
 1466: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))),
 1467:     {Loopback,Pa,
 1468:      #sctp_assoc_change{state=shutdown_comp,
 1469: 			error=0,
 1470: 			assoc_id=SbAssocId}} =
 1471: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))),
 1472:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb),
 1473: 
 1474:     receive
 1475: 	Msg -> ct:fail({received,Msg})
 1476:     after 17 -> ok
 1477:     end,
 1478:     ok.
 1479: 
 1480: 
 1481: 
 1482: do_from_other_process(Fun) ->
 1483:     Parent = self(),
 1484:     Ref = make_ref(),
 1485:     Child =
 1486: 	spawn(fun () ->
 1487: 		      try Fun() of
 1488: 			  Result ->
 1489: 			      Parent ! {Ref,Result}
 1490: 		      catch
 1491: 			  Class:Reason:Stacktrace ->
 1492: 			      Parent ! {Ref,Class,Reason,Stacktrace}
 1493: 		      end
 1494: 	      end),
 1495:     Mref = erlang:monitor(process, Child),
 1496:     receive
 1497: 	{Ref,Result} ->
 1498: 	    receive {'DOWN',Mref,_,_,_} -> Result end;
 1499: 	{Ref,Class,Reason,Stacktrace} ->
 1500: 	    receive {'DOWN',Mref,_,_,_} ->
 1501: 		    erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1502: 	    end;
 1503: 	{'DOWN',Mref,_,_,Reason} ->
 1504: 	    erlang:exit(Reason)
 1505:     end.
 1506: 
 1507: 
 1508: %% Peel off an SCTP stream socket ({active,once}).
 1509: 
 1510: peeloff_active_once(Config) ->
 1511:     peeloff(Config, [{active,once}]).
 1512: 
 1513: %% Peel off an SCTP stream socket ({active,true}).
 1514: 
 1515: peeloff_active_true(Config) ->
 1516:     peeloff(Config, [{active,true}]).
 1517: 
 1518: %% Peel off an SCTP stream socket ({active,N}).
 1519: 
 1520: peeloff_active_n(Config) ->
 1521:     peeloff(Config, [{active,1}]).
 1522: 
 1523: peeloff(Config, SockOpts) when is_list(Config) ->
 1524:     Addr = {127,0,0,1},
 1525:     Stream = 0,
 1526:     Timeout = 333,
 1527:     StartTime = timestamp(),
 1528:     {{S1,P1,S1Ai}, {S2,P2,S2Ai}} =
 1529:         socket_pair_open(Addr, StartTime, Timeout),
 1530:     Socket1 = socket_call(S1, get_socket),
 1531:     ?LOGVAR(Socket1),
 1532:     Socket2 = socket_call(S2, get_socket),
 1533:     ?LOGVAR(Socket2),
 1534:     %%
 1535:     socket_call(S2, {send,S2Ai,Stream,<<"Number one">>}),
 1536:     receive
 1537: 	{S1,{Addr,P2,S1Ai,Stream,<<"Number one">>}} -> ok
 1538:     after Timeout ->
 1539: 	    socket_bailout([S1,S2], StartTime)
 1540:     end,
 1541:     socket_call(S2, {send,Socket1,S1Ai,Stream,<<"Number two">>}),
 1542:     receive
 1543: 	{S2,{Addr,P1,S2Ai,Stream,<<"Number two">>}} -> ok
 1544:     after Timeout ->
 1545: 	    socket_bailout([S1,S2], StartTime)
 1546:     end,
 1547:     %%
 1548:     S3 = socket_peeloff(Socket1, S1Ai, SockOpts, Timeout),
 1549:     ?LOGVAR(S3),
 1550:     P3_X = socket_call(S3, get_port),
 1551:     ?LOGVAR(P3_X),
 1552:     P3 = case P3_X of 0 -> P1; _ -> P3_X end,
 1553:     [{_,#sctp_paddrinfo{assoc_id=S3Ai,state=active}}] =
 1554: 	socket_call(S3,
 1555: 		    {getopts,[{sctp_get_peer_addr_info,
 1556: 			       #sctp_paddrinfo{address={Addr,P2}}}]}),
 1557:     %%S3Ai = S1Ai,
 1558:     ?LOGVAR(S3Ai),
 1559:     %%
 1560:     socket_call(S3, {send,S3Ai,Stream,<<"Number three">>}),
 1561:     receive
 1562: 	{S2,{Addr,P3,S2Ai,Stream,<<"Number three">>}} -> ok
 1563:     after Timeout ->
 1564: 	    socket_bailout([S1,S2,S3], StartTime)
 1565:     end,
 1566:     socket_call(S3, {send,Socket2,S2Ai,Stream,<<"Number four">>}),
 1567:     receive
 1568: 	{S3,{Addr,P2,S3Ai,Stream,<<"Number four">>}} -> ok
 1569:     after Timeout ->
 1570: 	    socket_bailout([S1,S2,S3], StartTime)
 1571:     end,
 1572:     %%
 1573:     inet:i(sctp),
 1574:     socket_close_verbose(S1, StartTime),
 1575:     socket_close_verbose(S2, StartTime),
 1576:     receive
 1577: 	{S3,{Addr,P2,#sctp_shutdown_event{assoc_id=S3Ai_X}}} ->
 1578: 	    match_unless_solaris(S3Ai, S3Ai_X)
 1579:     after Timeout ->
 1580: 	    socket_bailout([S3], StartTime)
 1581:     end,
 1582:     receive
 1583: 	{S3,{Addr,P2,#sctp_assoc_change{state=shutdown_comp,
 1584: 					assoc_id=S3Ai}}} -> ok
 1585:     after Timeout ->
 1586: 	    socket_bailout([S3], StartTime)
 1587:     end,
 1588:     socket_close_verbose(S3, StartTime),
 1589:     [] = flush(),
 1590:     ok.
 1591: 
 1592: %% Check sndbuf and recbuf behaviour.
 1593: buffers(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1594:     Limit = 4096,
 1595:     Addr = {127,0,0,1},
 1596:     Stream = 1,
 1597:     Timeout = 3333,
 1598:     StartTime = timestamp(),
 1599:     {{S1,_P1,S1Ai}, {S2,P2,S2Ai}} = SocketPair =
 1600:         socket_pair_open(Addr, StartTime, Timeout),
 1601:     %%
 1602:     socket_call(S1, {setopts,[{recbuf,Limit}]}),
 1603:     Recbuf =
 1604: 	case socket_call(S1, {getopts,[recbuf]}) of
 1605: 	    [{recbuf,RB1}] when RB1 >= Limit -> RB1
 1606: 	end,
 1607:     Data = mk_data(Recbuf+Limit),
 1608:     socket_call(S2, {setopts,[{sndbuf,Recbuf+Limit}]}),
 1609:     socket_call(S2, {send,S2Ai,Stream,Data}),
 1610:     receive
 1611: 	{S1,{Addr,P2,S1Ai,Stream,Data}} -> ok
 1612:     after Timeout ->
 1613: 	    socket_bailout([S1,S2], StartTime)
 1614:     end,
 1615:     %%
 1616:     socket_pair_close(Addr, StartTime, Timeout, SocketPair).
 1617: 
 1618: mk_data(Bytes) ->
 1619:     mk_data(0, Bytes, <<>>).
 1620: %%
 1621: mk_data(N, Bytes, Bin) when N < Bytes ->
 1622:     mk_data(N+4, Bytes, <<Bin/binary,N:32>>);
 1623: mk_data(_, _, Bin) ->
 1624:     Bin.
 1625: 
 1626: 
 1627: send_block(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1628:     Limit          = 4096,
 1629:     Addr           = {127,0,0,1},
 1630:     Stream         = 1,
 1631:     Timeout        = 1111,
 1632:     ReceiveTimeout = 3333,
 1633:     StartTime      = timestamp(),
 1634:     N              = 8,
 1635:     %%
 1636:     {{S1,P1,S1Ai}, {S2,_P2,S2Ai}} = SocketPair =
 1637:         socket_pair_open(Addr, StartTime, Timeout),
 1638:     %%
 1639:     socket_call(S1, {setopts,[{sndbuf,Limit}]}),
 1640:     Sndbuf =
 1641: 	case socket_call(S1, {getopts,[sndbuf]}) of
 1642: 	    [{sndbuf,SB1}] when SB1 >= Limit -> SB1
 1643: 	end,
 1644:     ?LOGVAR(Sndbuf),
 1645:     Data = mk_data(Sndbuf div 2),
 1646:     Seq = lists:seq(1, N),
 1647:     ok = socket_call(S2, {setopts,[{recbuf,Sndbuf*2},{active,false}]}),
 1648:     Sender = self(),
 1649:     ReceiveFun =
 1650:         fun RF(J) when 0 < J ->
 1651:                 receive
 1652:                     {Sender, send, J} ->
 1653:                         ct:log("send signalled {~w}: ~w~n", [self(), J]),
 1654:                         RF(J + 1)
 1655:                 after Timeout ->
 1656:                         ct:log("send timed out {~w}: ~w~n", [self(), J]),
 1657:                         ok = socket_call(S2, {setopts, [{active, true}]}),
 1658:                         ct:log("set active true {~w}: ~w~n", [self(), J]),
 1659:                         RF(-1)
 1660:                 end;
 1661:             RF(J) when -N =< J, J < 0 ->
 1662:                 receive
 1663:                     {S2,{Addr,P1,S2Ai,Stream,<<I:32,Data/binary>>}} ->
 1664:                         ct:log("recv {~w}: ~w~n", [self(), I]),
 1665:                         I = -J,
 1666:                         RF(J - 1)
 1667:                 after ReceiveTimeout ->
 1668:                         %% For some reason, hopefully not our fault,
 1669:                         %% we'll say OS reason for now, there is a 1..2 s
 1670:                         %% delay between the first and the second message
 1671:                         %% received after setting active=true,
 1672:                         %% even though there are 2 (at least) messages
 1673:                         %% buffered by the sending side.
 1674:                         %%
 1675:                         %% Therefore ReceiveTimeout is above 3 s
 1676:                         %% while Timeout can be shorter...
 1677:                         socket_bailout([S1,S2], StartTime)
 1678:                 end;
 1679:             RF(J) when J < -N ->
 1680:                 ok = socket_controlling_process(S2, Sender),
 1681:                 Sender ! {self(), ok}
 1682:         end,
 1683:     Receiver = spawn_link(fun () -> ReceiveFun(1) end),
 1684:     ok = socket_controlling_process(S2, Receiver),
 1685:     [begin
 1686:          ok = socket_call(S1, {send,S1Ai,Stream,<<J:32,Data/binary>>}),
 1687:          ct:log("send {~w}: ~w~n", [self(), J]),
 1688:          Receiver ! {Sender, send, J}
 1689:      end || J <- Seq],
 1690:     receive {Receiver, ok} -> ok end,
 1691:     %%
 1692:     socket_pair_close(Addr, StartTime, Timeout, SocketPair).
 1693: 
 1694: %% Test opening a multihoming ipv4 socket.
 1695: open_multihoming_ipv4_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1696:     ?P("get addrs by family (inet)"),
 1697:     case get_addrs_by_family(inet, 2) of
 1698: 	{ok, [Addr1, Addr2]} ->
 1699:             ?P("got addrs: "
 1700:                "~n      Addr1: ~p"
 1701:                "~n      Addr2: ~p", [Addr1, Addr2]),
 1702: 	    do_open_and_connect([Addr1, Addr2], Addr1);
 1703: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1704:             ?P("failed get addrs: "
 1705:                "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
 1706: 	    {skip, Reason}
 1707:     end.
 1708: 
 1709: %% This test is mostly aimed to indicate whether host has a
 1710: %% non-working ipv6 setup.  Test opening a unihoming (non-multihoming)
 1711: %% ipv6 socket.
 1712: open_unihoming_ipv6_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1713:     case get_addrs_by_family(inet6, 1) of
 1714: 	{ok, [Addr]} ->
 1715: 	    do_open_and_connect([Addr], Addr);
 1716: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1717: 	    {skip, Reason}
 1718:     end.
 1719: 
 1720: 
 1721: %% Test opening a multihoming ipv6 socket.
 1722: open_multihoming_ipv6_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1723:     case get_addrs_by_family(inet6, 2) of
 1724: 	{ok, [Addr1, Addr2]} ->
 1725: 	    do_open_and_connect([Addr1, Addr2], Addr1);
 1726: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1727: 	    {skip, Reason}
 1728:     end.
 1729: 
 1730: %% Test opening a multihoming ipv6 socket with ipv4 and ipv6 addresses.
 1731: open_multihoming_ipv4_and_ipv6_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1732:     case get_addrs_by_family(inet_and_inet6, 2) of
 1733: 	{ok, [[InetAddr1, InetAddr2], [Inet6Addr1, Inet6Addr2]]} ->
 1734: 	    %% Connect to the first address to test bind
 1735: 	    do_open_and_connect([InetAddr1, Inet6Addr1, InetAddr2],
 1736: 				InetAddr1),
 1737: 	    do_open_and_connect([Inet6Addr1, InetAddr1],
 1738: 				Inet6Addr1),
 1739: 
 1740: 	    %% Connect an address, not the first,
 1741: 	    %% to test sctp_bindx
 1742: 	    do_open_and_connect([Inet6Addr1, Inet6Addr2, InetAddr1],
 1743: 				Inet6Addr2),
 1744: 	    do_open_and_connect([Inet6Addr1, Inet6Addr2, InetAddr1],
 1745: 				InetAddr1);
 1746: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1747: 	    {skip, Reason}
 1748:     end.
 1749: 
 1750: %% Test inet:socknames/peernames on unihoming IPv4 sockets.
 1751: names_unihoming_ipv4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1752:     do_names(Config, inet, 1).
 1753: 
 1754: %% Test inet:socknames/peernames on unihoming IPv6 sockets.
 1755: names_unihoming_ipv6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1756:     do_names(Config, inet6, 1).
 1757: 
 1758: %% Test inet:socknames/peernames on multihoming IPv4 sockets.
 1759: names_multihoming_ipv4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1760:     do_names(Config, inet, 2).
 1761: 
 1762: %% Test inet:socknames/peernames on multihoming IPv6 sockets.
 1763: names_multihoming_ipv6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1764:     do_names(Config, inet6, 2).
 1765: 
 1766: 
 1767: 
 1768: do_names(_, FamilySpec, AddressCount) ->
 1769:     Fun =
 1770: 	fun (ServerSocket, _, ServerAssoc, ClientSocket, _, ClientAssoc) ->
 1771: 		ServerSocknamesNoassoc =
 1772: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:socknames(ServerSocket))),
 1773: 		?LOGVAR(ServerSocknamesNoassoc),
 1774: 		ServerSocknames =
 1775: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:socknames(ServerSocket, ServerAssoc))),
 1776: 		?LOGVAR(ServerSocknames),
 1777: 		[_|_] =
 1778: 		    ordsets:intersection
 1779: 		      (ServerSocknamesNoassoc, ServerSocknames),
 1780: 		ClientSocknamesNoassoc =
 1781: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:socknames(ClientSocket))),
 1782: 		?LOGVAR(ClientSocknamesNoassoc),
 1783: 		ClientSocknames =
 1784: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:socknames(ClientSocket, ClientAssoc))),
 1785: 		?LOGVAR(ClientSocknames),
 1786: 		[_|_] =
 1787: 		    ordsets:intersection
 1788: 		      (ClientSocknamesNoassoc, ClientSocknames),
 1789: 		err([einval,enotconn], inet:peernames(ServerSocket)),
 1790: 		ServerPeernames =
 1791: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:peernames(ServerSocket, ServerAssoc))),
 1792: 		?LOGVAR(ServerPeernames),
 1793: 		err([einval,enotconn], inet:peernames(ClientSocket)),
 1794: 		ClientPeernames =
 1795: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:peernames(ClientSocket, ClientAssoc))),
 1796: 		?LOGVAR(ClientPeernames),
 1797: 		ServerSocknames = ClientPeernames,
 1798: 		ClientSocknames = ServerPeernames,
 1799: 		{ok,Socket} =
 1800: 		    gen_sctp:peeloff(ServerSocket, ServerAssoc),
 1801: 		SocknamesNoassoc =
 1802: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:socknames(Socket))),
 1803: 		?LOGVAR(SocknamesNoassoc),
 1804: 		Socknames =
 1805: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:socknames(Socket, ServerAssoc))),
 1806: 		?LOGVAR(Socknames),
 1807: 		true =
 1808: 		    ordsets:is_subset(SocknamesNoassoc, Socknames),
 1809: 		Peernames =
 1810: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:peernames(Socket, ServerAssoc))),
 1811: 		?LOGVAR(Peernames),
 1812: 		ok = gen_sctp:close(Socket),
 1813: 		Socknames = ClientPeernames,
 1814: 		ClientSocknames = Peernames,
 1815: 		ok
 1816: 	end,
 1817:     case get_addrs_by_family(FamilySpec, AddressCount) of
 1818: 	{ok, Addresses} when length(Addresses) =:= AddressCount ->
 1819: 	    do_open_and_connect(Addresses, hd(Addresses), Fun);
 1820: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1821: 	    {skip, Reason}
 1822:     end.
 1823: 
 1824: 
 1825: 
 1826: get_addrs_by_family(Family, NumAddrs) ->
 1827:     case os:type() of
 1828: 	{unix,linux} ->
 1829: 	    get_addrs_by_family_aux(Family, NumAddrs);
 1830: 	{unix,freebsd} ->
 1831: 	    get_addrs_by_family_aux(Family, NumAddrs);
 1832: 	{unix,sunos} ->
 1833: 	    case get_addrs_by_family_aux(Family, NumAddrs) of
 1834: 		{ok, [InetAddrs, Inet6Addrs]} when Family =:= inet_and_inet6 ->
 1835: 		    %% Man page for sctp_bindx on Solaris says: "If sock is an
 1836: 		    %% Internet Protocol Version 6 (IPv6) socket, addrs should
 1837: 		    %% be an array of sockaddr_in6 structures containing IPv6
 1838: 		    %% or IPv4-mapped IPv6 addresses."
 1839: 		    {ok, [ipv4_map_addrs(InetAddrs), Inet6Addrs]};
 1840: 		{ok, Addrs} ->
 1841: 		    {ok, Addrs};
 1842: 		{error, Reason} ->
 1843: 		    {error, Reason}
 1844: 	    end;
 1845: 	Os ->
 1846: 	    Reason = if Family =:= inet_and_inet6 ->
 1847: 			     ?F("Mixing ipv4 and ipv6 addresses for "
 1848: 			       " multihoming has not been verified on ~p",
 1849:                                 [Os]);
 1850: 			true ->
 1851: 			     ?F("Multihoming for ~p has not been verified "
 1852:                                 "on ~p", [Family, Os])
 1853: 		     end,
 1854: 	    {error, Reason}
 1855:     end.
 1856: 
 1857: get_addrs_by_family_aux(Family, NumAddrs) when Family =:= inet;
 1858: 					       Family =:= inet6 ->
 1859:     case inet:getaddr(localhost, Family) of
 1860: 	{error, eafnosupport = Reason} ->
 1861:             ?P("failed get (~w) addrs for localhost: ~p", [Family, Reason]),
 1862: 	    {error, ?F("No support for ~p (~p)", [Family, Reason])};
 1863:         {error, nxdomain = Reason} ->
 1864:             ?P("failed get (~w) addrs for localhost: ~p", [Family, Reason]),
 1865: 	    {error, ?F("No support for ~p (~p)", [Family, Reason])};
 1866: 	{ok, _} ->
 1867:             ?P("got addr for localhost (ignored)"),
 1868: 	    IfAddrs = ok(inet:getifaddrs()),
 1869:             ?P("IfAddrs: ~p", [IfAddrs]),
 1870: 	    case filter_addrs_by_family(IfAddrs, Family) of
 1871: 		Addrs when length(Addrs) >= NumAddrs ->
 1872: 		    {ok, lists:sublist(Addrs, NumAddrs)};
 1873: 		[] ->
 1874: 		    {error, ?F("Need ~p ~p address(es) found none~n",
 1875:                                [NumAddrs, Family])};
 1876: 		Addrs ->
 1877: 		    {error,
 1878: 		     ?F("Need ~p ~p address(es) found only ~p: ~p~n",
 1879:                         [NumAddrs, Family, length(Addrs), Addrs])}
 1880: 	    end
 1881:     end;
 1882: get_addrs_by_family_aux(inet_and_inet6, NumAddrs) ->
 1883:     try {ok, [case get_addrs_by_family_aux(Family, NumAddrs) of
 1884:                   {ok, Addrs}     -> Addrs;
 1885:                   {error, Reason} -> throw({error, Reason})
 1886:               end || Family <- [inet, inet6]]}
 1887:     catch
 1888:         throw:{error, _} = ERROR ->
 1889:             ERROR
 1890:     end.
 1891: 
 1892: filter_addrs_by_family(IfAddrs, Family) ->
 1893:     lists:flatten([[Addr || {addr, Addr} <- Info,
 1894: 			    is_good_addr(Addr, Family)]
 1895: 		   || {_IfName, Info} <- IfAddrs]).
 1896: 
 1897: is_good_addr(Addr, inet) when tuple_size(Addr) =:= 4 ->
 1898:     true;
 1899: is_good_addr({0,0,0,0,0,16#ffff,_,_}, inet6) ->
 1900:     false; %% ipv4 mapped
 1901: is_good_addr({16#fe80,_,_,_,_,_,_,_}, inet6) ->
 1902:     false; %% link-local
 1903: is_good_addr(Addr, inet6) when tuple_size(Addr) =:= 8 ->
 1904:     true;
 1905: is_good_addr(_Addr, _Family) ->
 1906:     false.
 1907: 
 1908: ipv4_map_addrs(InetAddrs) ->
 1909:     [begin
 1910: 	 <<AB:16>> = <<A,B>>,
 1911: 	 <<CD:16>> = <<C,D>>,
 1912: 	 {0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 16#ffff, AB, CD}
 1913:      end || {A,B,C,D} <- InetAddrs].
 1914: 
 1915: do_open_and_connect(ServerAddresses, AddressToConnectTo) ->
 1916:     Fun = fun (_, _, _, _, _, _) -> ok end,
 1917:     do_open_and_connect(ServerAddresses, AddressToConnectTo, Fun).
 1918: %%
 1919: do_open_and_connect(ServerAddresses, AddressToConnectTo, Fun) ->
 1920:     {ServerFamily, ServerOpts} = get_family_by_addrs(ServerAddresses),
 1921:     io:format("Serving ~p addresses: ~p~n",
 1922: 	      [ServerFamily, ServerAddresses]),
 1923:     S1 = ok(gen_sctp:open(0, [{ip,Addr} || Addr <- ServerAddresses] ++
 1924: 			      [ServerFamily|ServerOpts])),
 1925:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(S1, true),
 1926:     P1 = ok(inet:port(S1)),
 1927:     ClientFamily = get_family_by_addr(AddressToConnectTo),
 1928:     io:format("Connecting to ~p ~p~n",
 1929: 	      [ClientFamily, AddressToConnectTo]),
 1930:     ClientOpts =
 1931: 	[ClientFamily |
 1932: 	 case ClientFamily of
 1933: 	     inet6 ->
 1934: 		 [{ipv6_v6only,true}];
 1935: 	     _ ->
 1936: 		 []
 1937: 	 end],
 1938:     S2 = ok(gen_sctp:open(0, ClientOpts)),
 1939:     log(open),
 1940:     %% Verify client can connect
 1941:     #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up} = S2Assoc =
 1942: 	ok(gen_sctp:connect(S2, AddressToConnectTo, P1, [])),
 1943:     log(comm_up),
 1944:     %% verify server side also receives comm_up from client
 1945:     S1Assoc = recv_comm_up_eventually(S1),
 1946:     Result = Fun(S1, ServerFamily, S1Assoc, S2, ClientFamily, S2Assoc),
 1947:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S2),
 1948:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S1),
 1949:     Result.
 1950: 
 1951: %% If at least one of the addresses is an ipv6 address, return inet6, else inet.
 1952: get_family_by_addrs(Addresses) ->
 1953:     case lists:usort([get_family_by_addr(Addr) || Addr <- Addresses]) of
 1954: 	[inet, inet6] -> {inet6, [{ipv6_v6only, false}]};
 1955: 	[inet]        -> {inet,  []};
 1956: 	[inet6]       -> {inet6, []}
 1957:     end.
 1958: 
 1959: get_family_by_addr(Addr) when tuple_size(Addr) =:= 4 -> inet;
 1960: get_family_by_addr(Addr) when tuple_size(Addr) =:= 8 -> inet6.
 1961: 
 1962: recv_comm_up_eventually(S) ->
 1963:     case ok(gen_sctp:recv(S)) of
 1964: 	{_Addr, _Port, _Info,
 1965: 	 #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up} = Assoc} ->
 1966: 	    Assoc;
 1967: 	{_Addr, _Port, _Info, _OtherSctpMsg} = Msg ->
 1968: 	    log({unexpected,Msg}),
 1969: 	    recv_comm_up_eventually(S)
 1970:     end.
 1971: 
 1972: 
 1973: %% 
 1974: recv_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1975:     ?P("create server socket (and listen)"),
 1976:     {ok, S} = gen_sctp:open(),
 1977:     gen_sctp:listen(S, true),
 1978:     {ok, SPort} = inet:port(S),
 1979: 
 1980:     ?P("create client socket (and connect)"),
 1981:     {ok, C} = gen_sctp:open(),
 1982:     {ok, _} = gen_sctp:connect(C, localhost, SPort, []),
 1983: 
 1984:     TC = self(),
 1985:     RECV = fun() ->
 1986:                    ?P("try setup recv(s)"),
 1987:                    ok = recv_close_setup_recv(S),
 1988:                    ?P("announce ready"),
 1989:                    TC ! {self(), ready},
 1990:                    ?P("try data recv"),
 1991:                    Res = gen_sctp:recv(S),
 1992:                    ?P("recv res: "
 1993:                       "~n   ~p", [Res]),
 1994:                    exit(Res)
 1995:            end,
 1996:     ?P("spawn reader - then await reader ready"),
 1997:     {Pid, MRef} = spawn_monitor(RECV),
 1998:     receive
 1999:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, PreReason} ->
 2000:             %% Make sure it does not die for some other reason...
 2001:             ?P("unexpected reader termination:"
 2002:                "~n   ~p", [PreReason]),
 2003:             (catch gen_sctp:close(S)),
 2004:             (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 2005:             ct:fail("Unexpected pre close from reader (~p): ~p",
 2006:                           [Pid, PreReason]);
 2007:         {Pid, ready} ->
 2008:             ?P("reader ready"),
 2009:             ok
 2010:     after 30000 -> % Just in case...
 2011:             %% This is **extreme**, but there is no way to know
 2012:             %% how long it will take to iterate through all the
 2013:             %% addresses of a host...
 2014:             ?P("reader ready timeout"),
 2015:             (catch gen_sctp:close(S)),
 2016:             (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 2017:             ct:fail("Unexpected pre close timeout (~p)", [Pid])
 2018:     end,
 2019: 
 2020:     ?P("\"ensure\" reader reading..."),
 2021:     receive
 2022:         Any ->
 2023:             ?P("Received unexpected message: "
 2024:                "~n   ~p", [Any]),
 2025:             (catch gen_sctp:close(S)),
 2026:             (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 2027:             ct:fail("Unexpected message: ~p", [Any])
 2028:     after 5000 ->
 2029:             ok
 2030:     end,
 2031: 
 2032:     ?P("close server socket"),
 2033:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S),
 2034:     ?P("await reader termination"),
 2035:     receive
 2036:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, {error, closed}} ->
 2037:             ?P("expected reader termination result"),
 2038:             (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 2039:             ok;
 2040:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, PostReason} ->
 2041:             ?P("unexpected reader termination: "
 2042:                "~n   ~p", [PostReason]),
 2043:             (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 2044:             ct:fail("Unexpected post close from reader (~p): ~p",
 2045:                           [Pid, PostReason])
 2046:     after 5000 ->
 2047:             ?P("unexpected reader termination timeout"),
 2048:             demonitor(MRef, [flush]),
 2049:             (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 2050:             exit(Pid, kill),
 2051:             ct:fail("Reader (~p) termination timeout", [Pid])
 2052:     end,
 2053:     ?P("close client socket"),
 2054:     (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 2055:     ?P("done"),
 2056:     ok.
 2057: 
 2058: 
 2059: recv_close_setup_recv(S) ->
 2060:     recv_close_setup_recv(S, 1).
 2061: 
 2062: recv_close_setup_recv(S, N) ->
 2063:     ?P("try setup recv ~w", [N]),
 2064:     case gen_sctp:recv(S, 5000) of
 2065:         {ok, {Addr,
 2066:               Port,
 2067:               _AncData, 
 2068:               Data}} when is_tuple(Addr) andalso is_integer(Port) ->
 2069:             ?P("setup recv ~w: "
 2070:                "~n   ~p", [N, Data]),
 2071:             recv_close_setup_recv(S, N+1);
 2072:         {error, timeout} ->
 2073:             ok
 2074:     end.
 2075: 
 2076: 
 2077: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2078: 
 2079: %% This is the most basic of (sockaddr) tests.
 2080: 
 2081: t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2082:     ct:timetrap(?MINS(1)),
 2083:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2084:             fun() -> ok end,
 2085:             fun() ->
 2086:                     Domain = inet,
 2087:                     LocalAddr =
 2088:                         case ?LIB:which_local_addr(Domain) of
 2089:                             {ok, LA} ->
 2090:                                 LA;
 2091:                             {error, _} ->
 2092:                                 skip("No local address")
 2093:                         end,
 2094:                     SockAddr = #{family   => Domain,
 2095:                                  addr     => LocalAddr,
 2096:                                  port     => 0},
 2097:                     do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(SockAddr, Config)
 2098:             end).
 2099: 
 2100: t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2101:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2102:             fun() -> ok end,
 2103:             fun() ->
 2104:                     Domain = inet,
 2105:                     LinkLocalAddr =
 2106:                         case ?LIB:which_link_local_addr(Domain) of
 2107:                             {ok, LLA} ->
 2108:                                 LLA;
 2109:                             {error, _} ->
 2110:                                 skip("No link local address")
 2111:                         end,
 2112:                     SockAddr = #{family => Domain,
