 2113:                                  addr   => LinkLocalAddr,
 2114:                                  port   => 0},
 2115:                     do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(SockAddr, Config)
 2116:             end).
 2117: 
 2118: 
 2119: t_simple_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2120:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2121:             fun() -> ?LIB:has_support_ipv6() end,
 2122:             fun() ->
 2123:                     Domain = inet6,
 2124:                     LocalAddr =
 2125:                         case ?LIB:which_local_addr(Domain) of
 2126:                             {ok, LA} ->
 2127:                                 LA;
 2128:                         {error, _} ->
 2129:                             skip("No local address")
 2130:                     end,
 2131:                     SockAddr = #{family   => Domain,
 2132:                                  addr     => LocalAddr,
 2133:                                  port     => 0},
 2134:                     do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(SockAddr, Config)
 2135:             end).
 2136: 
 2137: 
 2138: t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2139:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2140:             fun() ->
 2141:                     ?LIB:has_support_ipv6(),
 2142:                     is_net_supported(),
 2143:                     is_not_freebsd()
 2144:             end,
 2145:             fun() ->
 2146:                     Domain = inet6,
 2147:                     LinkLocalAddr =
 2148:                         case ?LIB:which_link_local_addr(Domain) of
 2149:                             {ok, LLA} ->
 2150:                                 LLA;
 2151:                             {error, _} ->
 2152:                                 skip("No link local address")
 2153:                         end,
 2154:                     Filter =
 2155:                         fun(#{addr := #{family := D,
 2156:                                         addr   := A}} = C) ->
 2157:                                 if
 2158:                                     (D =:= Domain) andalso
 2159:                                     (A =:= LinkLocalAddr) ->
 2160:                                         ?P("found link-local candidate: "
 2161:                                            "~n   ~p", [C]),
 2162:                                         true;
 2163:                                     true ->
 2164:                                         false
 2165:                                 end;                                        
 2166:                            (_) ->
 2167:                                 false
 2168:                         end,
 2169:                     case net:getifaddrs(Filter) of
 2170:                         {ok, [#{addr := #{scope_id := ScopeID}} = H|T]} ->
 2171:                             ?P("found link-local candidate(s): "
 2172:                                "~n   Candidate:         ~p"
 2173:                                "~n   Rest Candidate(s): ~p", [H, T]),
 2174:                             SockAddr = #{family   => Domain,
 2175:                                          addr     => LinkLocalAddr,
 2176:                                          port     => 0,
 2177:                                          scope_id => ScopeID},
 2178:                             do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(SockAddr, Config);
 2179:                         {ok, _} ->
 2180:                             skip("Scope ID not found");
 2181:                         {error, R} ->
 2182:                             skip({failed_getifaddrs, R})
 2183:                     end
 2184:             end).
 2185: 
 2186: do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(#{family := _Fam} = SockAddr, _) ->
 2187:     %% Create the server
 2188:     Self   = self(),
 2189:     ?P("~n      SockAddr: ~p", [SockAddr]),
 2190:     ServerF = fun() ->
 2191:                       ?P("[server] try create (open) listen socket"),
 2192:                       Sock =
 2193:                           try gen_sctp:open([{ifaddr, SockAddr},
 2194:                                              {active, true},
 2195:                                              binary]) of
 2196:                               {ok, S} ->
 2197:                                   S;
 2198:                               {error, OReason} ->
 2199:                                   ?P("open error: "
 2200:                                      "~n      Reason: ~p", [OReason]),
 2201:                                   exit({open_error, OReason})
 2202:                           catch
 2203:                               OC:OE:OS ->
 2204:                                   ?P("open failure: "
 2205:                                      "~n      Error Class: ~p"
 2206:                                      "~n      Error:       ~p"
 2207:                                      "~n      Call Stack:  ~p", [OC, OE, OS]),
 2208:                                   exit({open_failure, {OC, OE, OS}})
 2209:                           end,
 2210: 
 2211:                       ?P("[server] try make 'listen' socket"),
 2212:                       ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sock, true),
 2213: 
 2214:                       ?P("[server] try get port number"),
 2215:                       {ok, Port}  = inet:port(Sock),
 2216:                       ?P("[server] port: ~w", [Port]),
 2217:                       Self ! {{port, Port}, self()},
 2218: 
 2219: 
 2220:                       ?P("try accept (await 'accept' message)"),
 2221:                       AssocID1 =
 2222:                           receive
 2223:                               {sctp,
 2224:                                Sock,
 2225:                                FromIP11, FromPort11,
 2226:                                {ANC1, #sctp_assoc_change{state            = comm_up,
 2227:                                                          error            = 0,
 2228:                                                          outbound_streams = OutStreams1,
 2229:                                                          inbound_streams  = InStreams1,
 2230:                                                          assoc_id         = AID1}}} ->
 2231:                                   ?P("[server] received assoc - accepted: "
 2232:                                      "~n      From IP:     ~p"
 2233:                                      "~n      From Port:   ~p"
 2234:                                      "~n      ANC:         ~p"
 2235:                                      "~n      Out Streams: ~p"
 2236:                                      "~n      In Streams:  ~p"
 2237:                                      "~n      Assoc ID:    ~p",
 2238:                                      [FromIP11, FromPort11, ANC1,
 2239:                                       OutStreams1, InStreams1, AID1]),
 2240:                                   AID1
 2241:                           end,
 2242: 
 2243:                       ?P("[server] await message 2"),
 2244:                       receive
 2245:                           {sctp, Sock, FromIP12, FromPort12, {_, <<"hej">>}} ->
 2246:                               ?P("[server] received expected message 1: "
 2247:                                  "~n      FromIP2:   ~p"
 2248:                                  "~n      FromPort2: ~p"
 2249:                                  "~n      => send reply", [FromIP12, FromPort12]),
 2250:                               ok = gen_sctp:send(Sock, AssocID1, 1, "hopp")
 2251:                       end,
 2252: 
 2253: 
 2254:                       ?P("try accept (await 'accept' message)"),
 2255:                       AssocID2 =
 2256:                           receive
 2257:                               {sctp,
 2258:                                Sock,
 2259:                                FromIP21, FromPort21,
 2260:                                {ANC2, #sctp_assoc_change{state            = comm_up,
 2261:                                                          error            = 0,
 2262:                                                          outbound_streams = OutStreams2,
 2263:                                                          inbound_streams  = InStreams2,
 2264:                                                          assoc_id         = AID2}}} ->
 2265:                                   ?P("[server] received assoc - accepted: "
 2266:                                      "~n      FromIP:      ~p"
 2267:                                      "~n      FromPort:    ~p"
 2268:                                      "~n      ANC:         ~p"
 2269:                                      "~n      Out Streams: ~p"
 2270:                                      "~n      In Streams:  ~p"
 2271:                                      "~n      Assoc ID:    ~p",
 2272:                                      [FromIP21, FromPort21, ANC2,
 2273:                                       OutStreams2, InStreams2, AID2]),
 2274:                                   AID2
 2275:                           end,
 2276: 
 2277:                       ?P("[server] await message 1"),
 2278:                       receive
 2279:                           {sctp, Sock, FromIP22, FromPort22, {_, <<"hej">>}} ->
 2280:                               ?P("[server] received expected message 1: "
 2281:                                  "~n      From IP:   ~p"
 2282:                                  "~n      From Port: ~p"
 2283:                                  "~n      => send reply", [FromIP22, FromPort22]),
 2284:                               ok = gen_sctp:send(Sock, AssocID2, 1, "hopp")
 2285:                       end,
 2286: 
 2287: 
 2288:                       ?P("[server] await termination command"),
 2289:                       receive
 2290:                           {die, Self} ->
 2291:                               ?P("[server] terminating"),
 2292:                               (catch gen_tcp:close(Sock)),
 2293:                               exit(normal)
 2294:                       end
 2295:               end,
 2296:     ?P("try start server"),
 2297:     Server = spawn_link(ServerF),
 2298:     ?P("server started - await port "),
 2299:     ServerPort = receive
 2300:                      {{port, Port}, Server} ->
 2301:                          Port;
 2302:                      {'EXIT', Server, Reason} ->
 2303:                          ?P("server died unexpectedly: "
 2304:                             "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
 2305:                          exit({unexpected_server_failure, Reason})
 2306:                  end,
 2307:     ?P("server port received: ~p", [ServerPort]),
 2308:     
 2309: 
 2310:     ?P("try create client socket 1"),
 2311:     {ok, CSock1} = gen_sctp:open([{ifaddr, SockAddr},
 2312:                                   {active, true},
 2313:                                   binary]),
 2314: 
 2315:     ?P("client socket 1: "
 2316:        "~n      CSock: ~p"
 2317:        "~n      CPort: ~p", [CSock1, inet:port(CSock1)]),
 2318: 
 2319:     ?P("try connect client socket 1"),
 2320:     ServerSockAddr = SockAddr#{port => ServerPort},
 2321:     {COutStreams1, CInStreams1, CAssocID1} =
 2322:         case gen_sctp:connect(CSock1, ServerSockAddr, [], ?SECS(1)) of
 2323:             {ok, #sctp_assoc_change{state            = comm_up,
 2324:                                     error            = 0,
 2325:                                     outbound_streams = COS1,
 2326:                                     inbound_streams  = CIS1,
 2327:                                     assoc_id         = CAID1}} ->
 2328:                 {COS1, CIS1, CAID1};
 2329:             {ok, Unexpected1} ->
 2330:                 ?P("<ERROR> unexpected connect (1) result: "
 2331:                    "~n      ~p", [Unexpected1]),
 2332:                 ct:fail({unexpected_client_connect_result, 1, Unexpected1});
 2333:             {error, Reason1} ->
 2334:                 ?P("<ERROR> failed client 1 connect: "
 2335:                    "~n      Reason: ~p", [Reason1]),
 2336:                 ct:fail({client_connect_failed, 1, Reason1})
 2337:         end,
 2338: 
 2339:     ?P("client 1 connected: "
 2340:        "~n      Out Streams: ~p"
 2341:        "~n      In Streams:  ~p"
 2342:        "~n      Assoc ID:    ~p", [COutStreams1, CInStreams1, CAssocID1]),
 2343: 
 2344:     ?P("[client 1] try send message"),
 2345:     ok = gen_sctp:send(CSock1, CAssocID1, 1, "hej"),
 2346: 
 2347:     ?P("[client 1] await reply message"),
 2348:     receive
 2349:         {sctp, CSock1, _, _, {_, <<"hopp">>}} ->
 2350:             ?P("received expected reply message")
 2351:     end,
 2352: 
 2353: 
 2354:     ?P("[client 2] try create client socket"),
 2355:     {ok, CSock2} = gen_sctp:open([{ifaddr, SockAddr},
 2356:                                   {active, true},
 2357:                                   binary]),
 2358: 
 2359:     ?P("[client 2] client socket: "
 2360:        "~n      CSock: ~p"
 2361:        "~n      CPort: ~p", [CSock2, inet:port(CSock2)]),
 2362: 
 2363:     ?P("[client 2] try connect-init"),
 2364:     ServerSockAddr = SockAddr#{port => ServerPort},
 2365:     case gen_sctp:connect_init(CSock2, ServerSockAddr, []) of
 2366:         ok ->
 2367:             ok;
 2368:         {error, Reason2} ->
 2369:             ?P("<ERROR> failed client 2 connect: "
 2370:                "~n      Reason: ~p", [Reason2]),
 2371:             ct:fail({client_connect_failed, 2, Reason2})
 2372:     end,
 2373: 
 2374:     ?P("[client 2] await connect completion"),
 2375:     CAssocID2 =
 2376:         receive
 2377:             {sctp,
 2378:              CSock2,
 2379:              CFromIP2, CFromPort2,
 2380:              {CANC2, #sctp_assoc_change{state            = comm_up,
 2381:                                         error            = 0,
 2382:                                         outbound_streams = COutStreams2,
 2383:                                         inbound_streams  = CInStreams2,
 2384:                                         assoc_id         = CAID2}}} ->
 2385:                 ?P("[client 2] connected: "
 2386:                    "~n      From IP:     ~p"
 2387:                    "~n      From Port:   ~p"
 2388:                    "~n      ANC:         ~p"
 2389:                    "~n      Out Streams: ~p"
 2390:                    "~n      In Streams:  ~p"
 2391:                    "~n      Assoc ID:    ~p",
 2392:                    [CFromIP2, CFromPort2, CANC2,
 2393:                     COutStreams2, CInStreams2, CAID2]),
 2394:                 CAID2
 2395:         end,
 2396: 
 2397:     ?P("[client 2] try send message"),
 2398:     ok = gen_sctp:send(CSock2, CAssocID2, 1, "hej"),
 2399: 
 2400:     ?P("[client 2] await reply message"),
 2401:     receive
 2402:         {sctp, CSock2, _, _, {_, <<"hopp">>}} ->
 2403:             ?P("[client 2] received expected reply message")
 2404:     end,
 2405: 
 2406: 
 2407:     ?P("terminate server"),
 2408:     Server ! {die, self()},
 2409: 
 2410:     ?P("await server termination"),
 2411:     receive
 2412:         {'EXIT', Server, normal} ->
 2413:             ok
 2414:     end,
 2415:     
 2416:     ?P("cleanup"),
 2417:     (catch gen_sctp:close(CSock1)),
 2418:     (catch gen_sctp:close(CSock2)),
 2419: 
 2420:     ?P("done"),
 2421:     ok.
 2422: 
 2423:     
 2424: %% Test the sockaddr version of connectx_init/4.
 2425: t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_connectx_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2426:     Localhost = {127,0,0,1},
 2427:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open(),
 2428:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(Sb),
 2429:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open(),
 2430:     SockAddr = #{family   => inet,
 2431:                  addr     => Localhost,
 2432:                  port     => Pb},
 2433:     case gen_sctp:connectx_init(Sa, [SockAddr], []) of
 2434:         {ok, A1} ->
 2435: 	    true = (A1 =/= 0),
 2436:             {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=cant_assoc, assoc_id = A1}} =
 2437:                 recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))),
 2438:             ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
 2439:             {ok, A2} = gen_sctp:connectx_init(Sa, [SockAddr], []),
 2440: 	    true = (A2 =/= 0),
 2441:             {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up, assoc_id = A2}} =
 2442:                 recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))),
 2443:             ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
 2444:             ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb);
 2445:         {error, enotsup} ->
 2446:             ok
 2447:     end,
 2448:     ok.
 2449: 
 2450: 
 2451: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2452: 
 2453: non_block_send(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2454:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 2455:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 2456:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 2457:                             Addr;
 2458:                         {error, Reason} ->
 2459:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 2460:                     end
 2461:            end,
 2462:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_non_block_send(Config, Addr) end,
 2463:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 2464:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 2465: 
 2466: do_non_block_send(_Config, Addr) ->
 2467:     {Server, Port} = nbs_server_start(Addr),
 2468:     Client         = nbs_client_start(Addr, Port),
 2469:     ok = nbs_await_client_blocked(Client),
 2470:     nbs_command_continue("server", Server),
 2471:     ok = nbs_await_server_recv(Server),
 2472:     nbs_command_continue("client", Client),
 2473:     nbs_command_continue("server", Server),
 2474:     case nbs_await_client_done(Client) of
 2475:         ok ->
 2476:             nbs_server_stop(Server),
 2477:             ok;
 2478:         {error, Reason} ->
 2479:             nbs_server_stop(Server),
 2480:             exit(Reason)
 2481:     end.
 2482: 
 2483: nbs_command_continue(Who, Pid) ->
 2484:     ?P("[ctrl] command ~s continue", [Who]),
 2485:     Pid ! {?MODULE, self(), continue}.
 2486:     
 2487: nbs_await_server_recv(Server) ->
 2488:     ?P("[ctrl] await server recv"),
 2489:     receive
 2490:         {?MODULE, Server, recv} ->
 2491:             ?P("[ctrl] server recv"),
 2492:             ok
 2493:     end.
 2494:     
 2495: nbs_await_client_blocked(Client) ->
 2496:     ?P("[ctrl] await client blocked"),
 2497:     receive
 2498:         {?MODULE, Client, blocked} ->
 2499:             ?P("[ctrl] client blocked"),
 2500:             ok
 2501:     end.
 2502: 
 2503: nbs_await_client_done(Client) ->
 2504:     ?P("[ctrl] await client done"),
 2505:     receive
 2506:         {'EXIT', Client, normal} ->
 2507:             ?P("[ctrl] client done"),
 2508:             ok;
 2509:         {'EXIT', Client, Reason} ->
 2510:             ?P("[ctrl] client failed: "
 2511:                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 2512:             {error, Reason}
 2513:     end.
 2514: 
 2515: 
 2516: nbs_server_start(Addr) ->
 2517:     Self = self(),
 2518:     Pid  = spawn_link(fun() -> nbs_server_init(Self, Addr) end),
 2519:     receive
 2520:         {?MODULE, Pid, {ok, Port}} when is_integer(Port) ->
 2521:             {Pid, Port}
 2522:     end.
 2523: 
 2524: nbs_server_stop(Server) ->
 2525:     ?P("[ctrl] command server stop"),
 2526:     Server ! {?MODULE, self(), stop},
 2527:     ?P("[ctrl] await server stopped"),
 2528:     receive
 2529:         {'EXIT', Server, normal} ->
 2530:             ?P("[ctrl] server stopped"),
 2531:             ok;
 2532:         {'EXIT', Server, Reason} ->
 2533:             ?P("[ctrl] server failed: "
 2534:                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 2535:             {error, Reason}
 2536:     end.
 2537: 
 2538: nbs_server_init(Parent, Addr) ->
 2539:     ?P("[server] Try create socket"),
 2540:     case gen_sctp:open(0, [{recbuf, 16384}, {ip, Addr}, {debug, true}] ) of
 2541:         {ok, S} ->
 2542:             {ok, [false]} = inet:getopts(S, [non_block_send]),
 2543:             {ok, Port} = inet:port(S),
 2544:             ?P("[server] Try make listen"),
 2545:             ok = gen_sctp:listen(S, true),
 2546:             Parent ! {?MODULE, self(), {ok, Port}},
 2547:             nbs_server_main(Parent, S);
 2548:         {error, Reason} ->
 2549:             exit({server, Reason})
 2550:     end.
 2551: 
 2552: nbs_server_main(Parent, Sock) ->
 2553:     ?P("[server] await controller continue command"),
 2554:     receive
 2555:         {?MODULE, Parent, continue} ->
 2556:             ?P("[server] received controller continue command"),
 2557:             ok
 2558:     end,
 2559:     nbs_server_loop(Parent, Sock, true),
 2560:     ?P("[server] await controller stop command"),
 2561:     receive
 2562:         {?MODULE, Parent, stop} ->
 2563:             ?P("[server] received controller stop command"),
 2564:             gen_sctp:close(Sock)
 2565:     end.
 2566: 
 2567: nbs_server_loop(Parent, Sock, Retry) ->
 2568:     case gen_sctp:recv(Sock, 5000) of
 2569:         {ok, {FromIP, FromPort, AncData, Data}} when is_binary(Data) ->
 2570:             ?P("[server] received data: "
 2571:                "~n   From IP:   ~p"
 2572:                "~n   From Port: ~p"
 2573:                "~n   Anc Data:  ~p"
 2574:                "~n   sz(Data):  ~p",
 2575:                [FromIP, FromPort, AncData, byte_size(Data)]),
 2576:             nbs_server_loop(Parent, Sock, Retry);
 2577:         {ok, {FromIP, FromPort, AncData, Data}} ->
 2578:             ?P("[server] received data: "
 2579:                "~n   From IP:   ~p"
 2580:                "~n   From Port: ~p"
 2581:                "~n   Anc Data:  ~p"
 2582:                "~n   Data:      ~p",
 2583:                [FromIP, FromPort, AncData, Data]),
 2584:             nbs_server_loop(Parent, Sock, Retry);
 2585:         {error, timeout} when (Retry =:= true) ->
 2586:             ?P("[server] receive timeout"),
 2587:             Parent ! {?MODULE, self(), recv},
 2588:             ?P("[server] await controller contue command"),
 2589:             receive
 2590:                 {?MODULE, Parent, continue} ->
 2591:                     ?P("[server] received continue command from controller"),
 2592:                     ok
 2593:             end,
 2594:             nbs_server_loop(Parent, Sock, false);
 2595:         {error, timeout} ->
 2596:             ?P("[server] receive timeout => done"),
 2597:             ok;
 2598:         {error, Reason} ->
 2599:             exit({server_recv, Reason})
 2600:     end.
 2601:             
 2602: 
 2603: nbs_client_start(Addr, Port) ->
 2604:     Self = self(),
 2605:     Pid  = spawn_link(fun() -> nbs_client_init(Self, Addr, Port) end),
 2606:     receive
 2607:         {?MODULE, Pid, ok} ->
 2608:             Pid
 2609:     end.
 2610: 
 2611: nbs_client_init(Parent, Addr, Port) ->
 2612:     OOpts = [{ip, Addr}, {non_block_send, true}],
 2613:     ?P("[client] Try create socket"),
 2614:     case gen_sctp:open(0, OOpts) of
 2615:         {ok, S} ->
 2616:             {ok, [true]} = inet:getopts(S, [non_block_send]),
 2617:             COpts = [{sctp_initmsg, #sctp_initmsg{num_ostreams = 5}}],
 2618:             ?P("[client] Try connect to server"),
 2619:             case gen_sctp:connect(S, Addr, Port, COpts) of
 2620:                 {ok, Assoc} ->
 2621:                     ?P("[client] assoc created"),
 2622:                     inet:setopts(S, [{debug, true}]),
 2623:                     Parent ! {?MODULE, self(), ok},
 2624:                     Data =
 2625:                         list_to_binary(
 2626:                           lists:flatten(
 2627:                             lists:duplicate(1024, "HejHoppDuGlade"))),
 2628:                     nbs_client_loop(Parent, S, Assoc, 0, 0, Data);
 2629:                 {error, CReason} ->
 2630:                     ?P("[client] failed connect: "
 2631:                        "~n   Reason: ~p", [CReason]),
 2632:                     gen_sctp:close(S),
 2633:                     exit({client_connect, CReason})
 2634:             end;
 2635:         {error, OReason} ->
 2636:             ?P("[client] failed create socket: "
 2637:                "~n   Reason: ~p", [OReason]),
 2638:             exit({client_open, OReason})
 2639:     end.
 2640: 
 2641: nbs_client_loop(Parent, S, Assoc, NumWrites, NumBytes, Data) ->
 2642:     nbs_client_loop(Parent, S, Assoc, NumWrites, NumBytes, Data, true).
 2643: 
 2644: nbs_client_loop(Parent, S, Assoc, NumWrites, NumBytes, Data, true) ->
 2645:     ?P("[client,true] try send when"
 2646:        "~n   Num Writes: ~p"
 2647:        "~n   Num Bytes:  ~p", [NumWrites, NumBytes]),
 2648:     %% Should we use all the streams?
 2649:     case gen_sctp:send(S, Assoc, 0, Data) of
 2650:         ok ->
 2651:             nbs_client_loop(Parent, S, Assoc,
 2652:                             NumWrites+1,
 2653:                             NumBytes + byte_size(Data),
 2654:                             Data, true);
 2655:         {error, eagain} ->
 2656:             ?P("[client] send blocked when"
 2657:                "~n   Num Writes: ~p"
 2658:                "~n   Num Bytes:  ~p", [NumWrites, NumBytes]),
 2659:             Parent ! {?MODULE, self(), blocked},
 2660:             ?P("[client] await continue command from controller"),
 2661:             receive
 2662:                 {?MODULE, Parent, continue} ->
 2663:                     ?P("[client] received continue command from controller"),
 2664:                     ok
 2665:             end,
 2666:             nbs_client_loop(Parent, S, Assoc,
 2667:                             NumWrites,
 2668:                             NumBytes,
 2669:                             Data, false);
 2670:         {error, Reason} ->
 2671:             ?P("[client] failed sending message: "
 2672:                "~n   Reason: ~p", [Reason]),
 2673:             gen_sctp:close(S),
 2674:             exit({send_failed, Reason})
 2675:     end;
 2676: nbs_client_loop(_Parent, S, Assoc, NumWrites, NumBytes, Data, false) ->
 2677:     ?P("[client,false] try send when"
 2678:        "~n   Num Writes: ~p"
 2679:        "~n   Num Bytes:  ~p", [NumWrites, NumBytes]),
 2680:     case gen_sctp:send(S, Assoc, 0, Data) of
 2681:         ok ->
 2682:             ?P("[client] sent final message - final option verification"),
 2683:             {ok, [true]} = inet:getopts(S, [non_block_send]),
 2684:             ok = inet:setopts(S, [{non_block_send, false}]),
 2685:             {ok, [false]} = inet:getopts(S, [non_block_send]),            
 2686:             ?P("[client] close socket"),
 2687:             gen_sctp:close(S),
 2688:             ?P("[client] done"),
 2689:             exit(normal);
 2690:         {error, Reason} ->
 2691:             ?P("[client] failed sending last message: "
 2692:                "~n   Reason: ~p", [Reason]),
 2693:             gen_sctp:close(S),
 2694:             exit({send_failed, Reason})
 2695:     end.
 2696: 
 2697: 
 2698: 
 2699: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2700: 
 2701: socket_pair_open(Addr, StartTime, Timeout) ->
 2702:     S1 = socket_open([{ip,Addr}], Timeout),
 2703:     ?LOGVAR(S1),
 2704:     P1 = socket_call(S1, get_port),
 2705:     ?LOGVAR(P1),
 2706:     ok = socket_call(S1, {listen,true}),
 2707:     S2 = socket_open([{ip,Addr}], Timeout),
 2708:     ?LOGVAR(S2),
 2709:     P2 = socket_call(S2, get_port),
 2710:     ?LOGVAR(P2),
 2711:     %%
 2712:     socket_call(S2, {connect_init,Addr,P1,[]}),
 2713:     S2Ai =
 2714: 	receive
 2715: 	    {S2,{Addr,P1,
 2716: 		 #sctp_assoc_change{
 2717: 		    state=comm_up,
 2718: 		    assoc_id=S2AssocId}}} -> S2AssocId
 2719: 	after Timeout ->
 2720: 		socket_bailout([S1,S2], StartTime)
 2721: 	end,
 2722:     S1Ai =
 2723: 	receive
 2724: 	    {S1,{Addr,P2,
 2725: 		 #sctp_assoc_change{
 2726: 		    state=comm_up,
 2727: 		    assoc_id=S1AssocId}}} -> S1AssocId
 2728: 	after Timeout ->
 2729: 		socket_bailout([S1,S2], StartTime)
 2730: 	end,
 2731:     {{S1,P1,S1Ai}, {S2,P2,S2Ai}}.
 2732: 
 2733: socket_pair_close(Addr, StartTime, Timeout, {{S1,P1,_S1Ai}, {S2,_P2,S2Ai}}) ->
 2734:     socket_close_verbose(S1, StartTime),
 2735:     receive
 2736: 	{S2,{Addr,P1,#sctp_shutdown_event{assoc_id=S2Ai}}} -> ok
 2737:     after Timeout ->
 2738: 	    socket_bailout([S2], StartTime)
 2739:     end,
 2740:     receive
 2741: 	{S2,{Addr,P1,#sctp_assoc_change{state=shutdown_comp,
 2742: 					assoc_id=S2Ai}}} -> ok
 2743:     after Timeout ->
 2744: 	    socket_bailout([S2], StartTime)
 2745:     end,
 2746:     socket_close_verbose(S2, StartTime),
 2747:     [] = flush(),
 2748:     ok.
 2749: 
 2750: %%% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2751: %%% socket gen_server ultra light
 2752: 
 2753: socket_open(SockOpts0, Timeout) ->
 2754:     SockOpts =
 2755: 	case lists:keyfind(active,1,SockOpts0) of
 2756: 	    false ->
 2757: 		[{active,once}|SockOpts0];
 2758: 	    _ ->
 2759: 		SockOpts0
 2760: 	end,
 2761:     Opts = [{type,seqpacket},binary|SockOpts],
 2762:     Starter =
 2763: 	fun () ->
 2764: 		{ok,Socket} =
 2765: 		    gen_sctp:open(Opts),
 2766: 		Socket
 2767: 	end,
 2768:     s_start(Starter, Timeout).
 2769: 
 2770: socket_peeloff(Socket, AssocId, SocketOpts, Timeout) ->
 2771:     Opts = [binary|SocketOpts],
 2772:     Starter =
 2773: 	fun () ->
 2774: 		{ok,NewSocket} =
 2775: 		    gen_sctp:peeloff(Socket, AssocId),
 2776: 		ok = inet:setopts(NewSocket, Opts),
 2777: 		NewSocket
 2778: 	end,
 2779:     s_start(Starter, Timeout).
 2780: 
 2781: socket_close_verbose(S, StartTime) ->
 2782:     History = socket_history(socket_close(S), StartTime),
 2783:     io:format("socket_close ~p:~n    ~p.~n", [S,History]),
 2784:     History.
 2785: 
 2786: socket_close(S) ->
 2787:     s_req(S, close).
 2788: 
 2789: socket_controlling_process(S, Pid) when is_pid(Pid) ->
 2790:     s_req(S, {controlling_process, Pid}).
 2791: 
 2792: socket_call(S, Request) ->
 2793:     s_req(S, {Request}).
 2794: 
 2795: %% socket_get(S, Key) ->
 2796: %%     s_req(S, {get,Key}).
 2797: 
 2798: socket_bailout([S|Ss], StartTime) ->
 2799:     History = socket_history(socket_close(S), StartTime),
 2800:     io:format("bailout ~p:~n    ~p.~n", [S,History]),
 2801:     socket_bailout(Ss, StartTime);
 2802: socket_bailout([], _) ->
 2803:     io:format("flush: ~p.~n", [flush()]),
 2804:     try throw(socket_bailout)
 2805:     catch throw : Reason : Stacktrace ->
 2806:             io:format("Stacktrace:~n    ~p.~n", [Stacktrace]),
 2807:             ct:fail(Reason)
 2808:     end, ok.
 2809: 
 2810: socket_history({State,Flush}, StartTime) ->
 2811:     {lists:keysort(
 2812:        2,
 2813:        lists:flatten(
 2814: 	 [[{Key,{TS-StartTime,Val}} || {TS,Val} <- Vals]
 2815: 	  || {Key,Vals} <- gb_trees:to_list(State)])),
 2816:      Flush}.
 2817: 
 2818: s_req(S, Req) ->
 2819:     AMref = erlang:monitor(process, S, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]),
 2820:     S ! {?MODULE, AMref, Req},
 2821:     receive
 2822:         {'DOWN', AMref, _, _, Error} ->
 2823:             exit(Error);
 2824:         {?MODULE, AMref, Reply} ->
 2825:             Reply
 2826:     end.
 2827: 
 2828: s_handle_req(Socket, Req) ->
 2829:     case Req of
 2830:         {listen,Listen} ->
 2831: 	    ok = gen_sctp:listen(Socket, Listen);
 2832: 	get_port ->
 2833: 	    ok(inet:port(Socket));
 2834: 	get_socket ->
 2835: 	    Socket;
 2836: 	{connect_init,ConAddr,ConPort,ConOpts} ->
 2837: 	    ok = gen_sctp:connect_init(Socket, ConAddr, ConPort, ConOpts);
 2838: 	{send,AssocId,Stream,Data} ->
 2839: 	    ok = gen_sctp:send(Socket, AssocId, Stream, Data);
 2840: 	{send,OtherSocket,AssocId,Stream,Data} ->
 2841: 	    ok = gen_sctp:send(OtherSocket, AssocId, Stream, Data);
 2842: 	{setopts,Opts} ->
 2843: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Socket, Opts);
 2844: 	{getopts,Optnames} ->
 2845: 	    ok(inet:getopts(Socket, Optnames))
 2846:     end.
 2847: 
 2848: s_start(Starter, Timeout) ->
 2849:     Parent = self(),
 2850:     spawn_link(
 2851:       fun () ->
 2852:               try
 2853:                   Socket = Starter(),
 2854:                   s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, gb_trees:empty())
 2855:               catch
 2856:                   Class:Reason:Stacktrace ->
 2857:                       io:format(?MODULE_STRING":socket exception ~w:~w at~n"
 2858:                                 "~p.~n", [Class,Reason,Stacktrace]),
 2859:                       erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2860:               end
 2861:       end).
 2862: 
 2863: s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, State) ->
 2864:     receive
 2865: 	{?MODULE,AMref,{controlling_process, NewParent}} ->
 2866: 	    AMref ! {?MODULE,AMref,ok},
 2867: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, NewParent, State);
 2868: 	{?MODULE,AMref,close} -> % socket_close()
 2869: 	    erlang:send_after(Timeout, self(), {?MODULE,AMref,exit}),
 2870: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, State);
 2871: 	{?MODULE,AMref,exit} ->
 2872: 	    ok = gen_sctp:close(Socket),
 2873: 	    NewState = gb_push(exit, Socket, State),
 2874: 	    AMref ! {?MODULE,AMref,{NewState,flush()}};
 2875: 	{?MODULE,AMref,{Req}} ->
 2876:             Result = s_handle_req(Socket, Req),
 2877: 	    NewState = gb_push(req, {Req,Result}, State),
 2878: 	    AMref ! {?MODULE, AMref,Result},
 2879: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, NewState);
 2880: 	%% {Parent,AMref,{get,Key}} ->
 2881: 	%%     AMref ! {?MODULE,AMref,gb_get(Key, State)},
 2882: 	%%     s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, State);
 2883: 	{sctp,Socket,Addr,Port,
 2884: 	 {[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,assoc_id=AssocId}=SRI],Data}}
 2885: 	  when not is_tuple(Data) ->
 2886: 	    case gb_get({assoc_change,AssocId}, State) of
 2887: 		[{Addr,Port,
 2888: 		  #sctp_assoc_change{
 2889: 		     state=comm_up,
 2890: 		     inbound_streams=Is}}|_]
 2891: 		  when 0 =< Stream, Stream < Is-> ok;
 2892: 		[] -> ok
 2893: 	    end,
 2894: 	    Key = {msg,AssocId,Stream},
 2895: 	    NewState = gb_push(Key, {Addr,Port,SRI,Data}, State),
 2896: 	    Parent ! {self(),{Addr,Port,AssocId,Stream,Data}},
 2897: 	    again(Socket),
 2898: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, NewState);
 2899: 	{sctp,Socket,Addr,Port,
 2900: 	 {SRI,#sctp_assoc_change{assoc_id=AssocId,state=St}=SAC}} ->
 2901: 	    case SRI of
 2902: 		[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=AssocId,stream=0}] -> ok;
 2903: 		[] -> ok
 2904: 	    end,
 2905: 	    Key = {assoc_change,AssocId},
 2906: 	    case {gb_get(Key, State),St} of
 2907: 		{[],_} -> ok;
 2908: 		{[{Addr,Port,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up}}|_],_}
 2909: 		  when St =:= comm_lost; St =:= shutdown_comp -> ok
 2910: 	    end,
 2911: 	    NewState = gb_push(Key, {Addr,Port,SAC}, State),
 2912: 	    Parent ! {self(),{Addr,Port,SAC}},
 2913: 	    again(Socket),
 2914: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, NewState);
 2915: 	{sctp,Socket,Addr,Port,
 2916: 	 {SRI,#sctp_paddr_change{assoc_id=AssocId,
 2917: 				 addr={_,P},
 2918: 				 state=St}=SPC}} ->
 2919: 	    match_unless_solaris(Port, P),
 2920: 	    case SRI of
 2921: 		[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=AssocId,stream=0}] -> ok;
 2922: 		[] -> ok
 2923: 	    end,
 2924: 	    case {gb_get({assoc_change,AssocId}, State),St} of
 2925: 		{[{Addr,Port,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up}}|_],_}
 2926: 		  when St =:= addr_available;
 2927: 		       St =:= addr_confirmed -> ok;
 2928: 		{[],addr_confirmed} -> ok
 2929: 	    end,
 2930: 	    Key = {paddr_change,AssocId},
 2931: 	    NewState = gb_push(Key, {Addr,Port,SPC}, State),
 2932: 	    again(Socket),
 2933: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, NewState);
 2934: 	{sctp,Socket,Addr,Port,
 2935: 	 {SRI,#sctp_shutdown_event{assoc_id=AssocId}=SSE}} ->
 2936: 	    case SRI of
 2937: 		[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=AssocId,stream=0}] -> ok;
 2938: 		[] -> ok
 2939: 	    end,
 2940: 	    case gb_get({assoc_change,AssocId}, State) of
 2941: 		[{Addr,Port,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up}}|_] -> ok;
 2942: 		[] -> ok
 2943: 	    end,
 2944: 	    Key = {shutdown_event,AssocId},
 2945: 	    NewState = gb_push(Key, {Addr,Port}, State),
 2946: 	    Parent ! {self(), {Addr,Port,SSE}},
 2947: 	    again(Socket),
 2948: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, NewState);
 2949: 	Unexpected ->
 2950: 	    erlang:error({unexpected,Unexpected})
 2951:     end.
 2952: 
 2953: again(Socket) ->
 2954:     receive
 2955: 	{sctp_passive,Socket} ->
 2956: 	    [{active, false}] = ok(inet:getopts(Socket, [active])),
 2957: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Socket,[{active,1}])
 2958:     after 0 ->
 2959: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Socket, [{active,once}])
 2960:     end.
 2961: 
 2962: gb_push(Key, Val, GBT) ->
 2963:     TS = timestamp(),
 2964:     case gb_trees:lookup(Key, GBT) of
 2965: 	none ->
 2966: 	    gb_trees:insert(Key, [{TS,Val}], GBT);
 2967: 	{value,V} ->
 2968: 	    gb_trees:update(Key, [{TS,Val}|V], GBT)
 2969:     end.
 2970: 
 2971: gb_get(Key, GBT) ->
 2972:     case gb_trees:lookup(Key, GBT) of
 2973: 	none ->
 2974: 	    [];
 2975: 	{value,V} ->
 2976: 	    [Val || {_TS,Val} <- V]
 2977:     end.
 2978: 
 2979: match_unless_solaris(A, B) ->
 2980:     case os:type() of
 2981: 	{unix,sunos} -> B;
 2982: 	_ -> A = B
 2983:     end.
 2984: 
 2985: 
 2986: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2987: 
 2988: 
 2989: is_net_supported() ->
 2990:     try net:info() of
 2991:         #{} ->
 2992:             ok
 2993:     catch
 2994:         error : notsup ->
 2995:             not_supported(net)
 2996:     end.
 2997: 
 2998: 
 2999: is_not_freebsd() ->
 3000:     is_not_platform(freebsd, "FreeBSD").
 3001: 
 3002: is_not_platform(Platform, PlatformStr)
 3003:   when is_atom(Platform) andalso is_list(PlatformStr) ->
 3004:       case os:type() of
 3005:         {unix, Platform} ->
 3006:             skip("This does not work on " ++ PlatformStr);
 3007:         _ ->
 3008:             ok
 3009:     end.
 3010: 
 3011: 
 3012: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3013: 
 3014: timestamp() ->
 3015:     erlang:monotonic_time().
 3016: 
 3017: 
 3018: pi(Item) ->
 3019:     {Item, Val} = process_info(self(), Item),
 3020:     Val.
 3021:     
 3022: 
 3023: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3024: 
 3025: not_supported(What) ->
 3026:     skip({not_supported, What}).
 3027: 
 3028: skip(Reason) ->
 3029:     throw({skip, Reason}).
 3030: 
 3031: 
 3032: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3033: 
 3034: log_ok(X) ->
 3035:     log(ok(X)).
 3036: 
 3037: ok({ok, X}) ->
 3038:     X;
 3039: ok({error, X}) ->
 3040:     ?P("ERROR: ~p", [X]),
 3041:     ct:fail({unexpected_error, X});
 3042: ok(X) ->
 3043:     ?P("UNEXPECTED: ~p", [X]),
 3044:     ct:fail({unexpected, X}).
 3045:     
 3046: 
 3047: log(X) ->
 3048:     ?P("LOG: ~p", [X]),
 3049:     X.
 3050: 
 3051: err([], Result) ->
 3052:     erlang:error(Result);
 3053: err([Reason|_], {error,Reason}) ->
 3054:     ok;
 3055: err([_|Reasons], Result) ->
 3056:     err(Reasons, Result).
 3057: 
 3058: 
 3059: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3060: 
 3061: open_failed_str(Reason) ->
 3062:     ?F("Open failed: ~w", [Reason]).
 3063:
